verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह्य॑ग्ने प्रथ॒मो म॒नोता॒स्या धि॒यो अभ॑वो दस्म॒ होता॑ त्वं सीं॑ वृषन्नकृणोर्दु॒ष्टरी॑तु॒ सहो॒ विश्व॑स्मै॒ सह॑से॒ सह॑ध्यै
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hy àgne prathamó manótā-  -asyā́ dhiyó ábhavo dasma hótā  tváṃ sīṃ vr̥ṣann akr̥ṇor duṣṭárītu  sáho víśvasmai sáhase sáhadhyai

translation.text: THOU, first inventor of this prayer, O Agni, Worker of Marvels, hast become our Herald. Thou, Bull, hast made us strength which none may conquer, strength that shall overcome all other prowess.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॒ होता॒ न्य॑सीदो॒ यजी॑यानि॒ळस्प॒द इ॒षय॒न्नीड्यः॒ सन् तं त्वा॒ नरः॑ प्रथ॒मं दे॑व॒यन्तो॑ म॒हो रा॒ये चि॒तय॑न्तो॒ अनु॑ ग्मन्
verses.transliteration: ádhā hótā ny àsīdo yájīyān  iḷás padá iṣáyann ī́ḍyaḥ sán  táṃ tvā náraḥ prathamáṃ devayánto  mahó rāyé citáyanto ánu gman

translation.text: As Priest thou sattest at the seat of worship, furthering us, best Offerer, meet for honour. So first to thee have pious men resorted, turning thy mind to thoughts of ample riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृ॒तेव॒ यन्तं॑ ब॒हुभि॑र्वस॒व्यै॒३॒॑स्त्वे र॒यिं जा॑गृ॒वांसो॒ अनु॑ ग्मन् रुश॑न्तम॒ग्निं द॑र्श॒तं बृ॒हन्तं॑ व॒पाव॑न्तं वि॒श्वहा॑ दीदि॒वांस॑म्
verses.transliteration: vr̥téva yántam bahúbhir vasavyaìs  tvé rayíṃ jāgr̥vā́ṃso ánu gman  rúśantam agníṃ darśatám br̥hántaṃ  vapā́vantaṃ viśváhā dīdivā́ṃsam

translation.text: In thee, still watching, they have followed riches, who goest with much wealth as with an army, The radiant Agni, lofty, fair to look on, worshipped with marrow, evermore resplendent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒दं दे॒वस्य॒ नम॑सा॒ व्यन्तः॑ श्रव॒स्यवः॒ श्रव॑ आप॒न्नमृ॑क्तम् नामा॑नि चिद्दधिरे य॒ज्ञिया॑नि भ॒द्रायां॑ ते रणयन्त॒ संदृ॑ष्टौ
verses.transliteration: padáṃ devásya námasā vyántaḥ  śravasyávaḥ śráva āpann ámr̥ktam  nā́māni cid dadhire yajñíyāni-  bhadrā́yāṃ te raṇayanta sáṃdr̥ṣṭau

translation.text: They who approached the God's abode with homage, eager for glory, won them perfect glory: Yea, they gained even sacrificial titles, and found delight in thine auspicious aspect.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां व॑र्धन्ति क्षि॒तयः॑ पृथि॒व्यां त्वां राय॑ उ॒भया॑सो॒ जना॑नाम् त्वं त्रा॒ता त॑रणे॒ चेत्यो॑ भूः पि॒ता मा॒ता सद॒मिन्मानु॑षाणाम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ vardhanti kṣitáyaḥ pr̥thivyā́ṃ  tvā́ṃ rā́ya ubháyāso jánānām  tváṃ trātā́ taraṇe cétyo bhūḥ  pitā́ mātā́ sádam ín mā́nuṣāṇām

translation.text: On earth the people magnify thee greatly, thee their celestial and terrestrial riches. Thou, Helper, must be known as our Preserver, Father and Mother of mankind for ever.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒प॒र्येण्यः॒ स प्रि॒यो वि॒क्ष्व१॒॑ग्निर्होता॑ म॒न्द्रो नि ष॑सादा॒ यजी॑यान् तं त्वा॑ व॒यं दम॒ आ दी॑दि॒वांस॒मुप॑ ज्ञु॒बाधो॒ नम॑सा सदेम
verses.transliteration: saparyéṇyaḥ sá priyó vikṣv àgnír  hótā mandró ní ṣasādā yájīyān  táṃ tvā vayáṃ dáma ā́ dīdivā́ṃsam  úpa jñubā́dho námasā sadema

translation.text: Dear priest among mankind, adorable Agni hath seated him, joy-giver, skilled in worship. Let us approach thee shining in thy dwelling, kneeling upon our knees, with adoration.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ व॒यं सु॒ध्यो॒३॒॑ नव्य॑मग्ने सुम्ना॒यव॑ ईमहे देव॒यन्तः॑ त्वं विशो॑ अनयो॒ दीद्या॑नो दि॒वो अ॑ग्ने बृह॒ता रो॑च॒नेन॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā vayáṃ sudhyò návyam agne  sumnāyáva īmahe devayántaḥ  tváṃ víśo anayo dī́dyāno  divó agne br̥hatā́ rocanéna

translation.text: Longing for bliss, pure-minded, God-devoted, Agni, we seek thee, such, meet to be lauded. Thou, Agni, leddest forth our men to battle, refulgent with the heaven's exalted splendour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒शां क॒विं वि॒श्पतिं॒ शश्व॑तीनां नि॒तोश॑नं वृष॒भं च॑र्षणी॒नाम् प्रेती॑षणिमि॒षय॑न्तं पाव॒कं राज॑न्तम॒ग्निं य॑ज॒तं र॑यी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: viśā́ṃ kavíṃ viśpátiṃ śáśvatīnāṃ  nitóśanaṃ vr̥ṣabháṃ carṣaṇīnā́m  prétīṣaṇim iṣáyantam pāvakáṃ  rā́jantam agníṃ yajatáṃ rayīṇā́m

translation.text: Sage of mankind, all peoples' Lord and Master, the Bull of men, the sender down of blessings, Still pressing on, promoting, purifying, Agni the Holy One, the Lord of riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सो अ॑ग्न ईजे शश॒मे च॒ मर्तो॒ यस्त॒ आन॑ट् स॒मिधा॑ ह॒व्यदा॑तिम् य आहु॑तिं॒ परि॒ वेदा॒ नमो॑भि॒र्विश्वेत्स वा॒मा द॑धते॒ त्वोतः॑
verses.transliteration: só agna īje śaśamé ca márto  yás ta ā́naṭ samídhā havyádātim  yá ā́hutim pári védā námobhir  víśvét sá vāmā́ dadhate tvótaḥ

translation.text: Agni, the mortal who hath toiled and worshipped, brought thee oblations with his kindled fuel, And well knows sacrifice with adoration, gains every joy with thee to guard and help him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मा उ॑ ते॒ महि॑ म॒हे वि॑धेम॒ नमो॑भिरग्ने स॒मिधो॒त ह॒व्यैः वेदी॑ सूनो सहसो गी॒र्भिरु॒क्थैरा ते॑ भ॒द्रायां॑ सुम॒तौ य॑तेम
verses.transliteration: asmā́ u te máhi mahé vidhema  námobhir agne samídhotá havyaíḥ  védī sūno sahaso gīrbhír ukthaír  ā́ te bhadrā́yāṃ sumataú yatema

translation.text: Mightily let us worship thee the Mighty, with reverence, Agni! fuel and oblations, With songs, O Son of Strength, with hymns, with altar: so may we strive for thine auspicious favour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यस्त॒तन्थ॒ रोद॑सी॒ वि भा॒सा श्रवो॑भिश्च श्रव॒स्य१॒॑स्तरु॑त्रः बृ॒हद्भि॒र्वाजैः॒ स्थवि॑रेभिर॒स्मे रे॒वद्भि॑रग्ने वित॒रं वि भा॑हि
verses.transliteration: ā́ yás tatántha ródasī ví bhāsā́  śrávobhiś ca śravasyàs tárutraḥ  br̥hádbhir vā́jai sthávirebhir asmé  revádbhir agne vitaráṃ ví bhāhi

translation.text: Thou who hast covered heaven and earth with splendour and with thy glories, glorious and triumphant. Continue thou to shine on us, O Agni, with strength abundant, rich, and long enduring.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नृ॒वद्व॑सो॒ सद॒मिद्धे॑ह्य॒स्मे भूरि॑ तो॒काय॒ तन॑याय प॒श्वः पू॒र्वीरिषो॑ बृह॒तीरा॒रेअ॑घा अ॒स्मे भ॒द्रा सौ॑श्रव॒सानि॑ सन्तु
verses.transliteration: nr̥vád vaso sádam íd dhehy asmé  bhū́ri tokā́ya tánayāya paśváḥ  pūrvī́r íṣo br̥hatī́r āré-aghāḥ-  asmé bhadrā́ sauśravasā́ni santu

translation.text: Vouchsafe us ever, as man needs, O Vasu, abundant wealth of kine for son and offspring. Food noble, plenteous, far from sin and evil, he with us, and fair fame to make us happy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रूण्य॑ग्ने पुरु॒धा त्वा॒या वसू॑नि राजन्व॒सुता॑ ते अश्याम् पु॒रूणि॒ हि त्वे पु॑रुवार॒ सन्त्यग्ने॒ वसु॑ विध॒ते राज॑नि॒ त्वे
verses.transliteration: purū́ṇy agne purudhā́ tvāyā́  vásūni rājan vasútā te aśyām  purū́ṇi hí tvé puruvāra sánti-  ágne vásu vidhaté rā́jani tvé

translation.text: May I obtain much wealth in many places by love of thee and through thy grace, King Agni; For in thee Bounteous One, in thee the Sovran, Agni, are many boons for him who serves thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि क्षैत॑व॒द्यशोऽग्ने॑ मि॒त्रो न पत्य॑से त्वं वि॑चर्षणे॒ श्रवो॒ वसो॑ पु॒ष्टिं न पु॑ष्यसि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí kṣaítavad yáśaḥ-  -ágne mitró ná pátyase  tváṃ vicarṣaṇe śrávo  váso puṣṭíṃ ná puṣyasi

translation.text: THOU, Agni, even as Mitra, hast a princely glory of thine own. Thou, active Vasu, makest fame increase like full prosperity.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां हि ष्मा॑ चर्ष॒णयो॑ य॒ज्ञेभि॑र्गी॒र्भिरीळ॑ते त्वां वा॒जी या॑त्यवृ॒को र॑ज॒स्तूर्वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिः
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ hí ṣmā carṣaṇáyo  yajñébhir gīrbhír ī́ḷate  tvā́ṃ vājī́ yāty avr̥kó  rajastū́r viśvácarṣaṇiḥ

translation.text: For, verily, men pray to thee with sacrifices and with songs. To thee the Friendly Courser, seen of all, comes speeding through the air.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒जोष॑स्त्वा दि॒वो नरो॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॑ के॒तुमि॑न्धते यद्ध॒ स्य मानु॑षो॒ जनः॑ सुम्ना॒युर्जु॒ह्वे अ॑ध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: sajóṣas tvā divó náro  yajñásya ketúm indhate  yád dha syá mā́nuṣo jánaḥ  sumnāyúr juhvé adhvaré

translation.text: Of one accord men kindle thee Heaven's signal of the sacrifice, When, craving bliss, this race of man invites thee to the solemn rite.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋध॒द्यस्ते॑ सु॒दान॑वे धि॒या मर्तः॑ श॒शम॑ते ऊ॒ती ष बृ॑ह॒तो दि॒वो द्वि॒षो अंहो॒ न त॑रति
verses.transliteration: ŕ̥dhad yás te sudā́nave  dhiyā́ mártaḥ śaśámate  ūtī́ ṣá br̥ható divó  dviṣó áṃho ná tarati

translation.text: Let the man thrive who travails sore, in prayer, far thee the Bountiful. He with the help of lofty Dyaus comes safe through straits of enmity.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मिधा॒ यस्त॒ आहु॑तिं॒ निशि॑तिं॒ मर्त्यो॒ नश॑त् व॒याव॑न्तं॒ स पु॑ष्यति॒ क्षय॑मग्ने श॒तायु॑षम्
verses.transliteration: samídhā yás ta ā́hutiṃ  níśitim mártyo náśat  vayā́vantaṃ sá puṣyati  kṣáyam agne śatā́yuṣam

translation.text: The mortal who with fuel lights thy flame and offers unto thee, Supports a house with many a branch, Agni, to live a hundred years.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वे॒षस्ते॑ धू॒म ऋ॑ण्वति दि॒वि षञ्छु॒क्र आत॑तः सूरो॒ न हि द्यु॒ता त्वं कृ॒पा पा॑वक॒ रोच॑से
verses.transliteration: tveṣás te dhūmá r̥ṇvati  diví ṣáñ chukrá ā́tataḥ  sū́ro ná hí dyutā́ tváṃ  kr̥pā́ pāvaka rócase

translation.text: Thy bright smoke lifts itself aloft, and far-extended shines in heaven. For, Purifier! like the Sun thou beamest with thy radiant glow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॒ हि वि॒क्ष्वीड्योऽसि॑ प्रि॒यो नो॒ अति॑थिः र॒ण्वः पु॒री॑व॒ जूर्यः॑ सू॒नुर्न त्र॑य॒याय्यः॑
verses.transliteration: ádhā hí vikṣv ī́ḍyaḥ-  -ási priyó no átithiḥ  raṇváḥ purī̀va jū́ryaḥ  sūnúr ná trayayā́yyaḥ

translation.text: For in men's houses thou must be glorified as a well-loved guest, Gay like an elder in a fort, claiming protection like a son.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रत्वा॒ हि द्रोणे॑ अ॒ज्यसेऽग्ने॑ वा॒जी न कृत्व्यः॑ परि॑ज्मेव स्व॒धा गयोऽत्यो॒ न ह्वा॒र्यः शिशुः॑
verses.transliteration: krátvā hí dróṇe ajyáse-  -ágne vājī́ ná kŕ̥tvyaḥ  párijmeva svadhā́ gáyaḥ-  -átyo ná hvāryáḥ śíśuḥ

translation.text: Thou, Agni, like an able steed, art urged by wisdom in the wood. Thou art like wind; food, home art thou, like a young horse that runs astray.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं त्या चि॒दच्यु॒ताग्ने॑ प॒शुर्न यव॑से धामा॑ ह॒ यत्ते॑ अजर॒ वना॑ वृ॒श्चन्ति॒ शिक्व॑सः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ tyā́ cid ácyutā-  -ágne paśúr ná yávase  dhā́mā ha yát te ajara  vánā vr̥ścánti śíkvasaḥ

translation.text: E'en things imperishable, thou, O Agni, like a gazing ox, Eatest, when hosts, Eternal One! of thee the Mighty rend the woods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वेषि॒ ह्य॑ध्वरीय॒तामग्ने॒ होता॒ दमे॑ वि॒शाम् स॒मृधो॑ विश्पते कृणु जु॒षस्व॑ ह॒व्यम॑ङ्गिरः
verses.transliteration: véṣi hy àdhvarīyatā́m  ágne hótā dáme viśā́m  samŕ̥dho viśpate kr̥ṇu  juṣásva havyám aṅgiraḥ

translation.text: Agni, thou enterest as Priest the home of men who sacrifice. Lord of the people, prosper them. Accept the ofrering, Angiras!

verses.sanskrit_deva: अच्छा॑ नो मित्रमहो देव दे॒वानग्ने॒ वोचः॑ सुम॒तिं रोद॑स्योः वी॒हि स्व॒स्तिं सु॑क्षि॒तिं दि॒वो नॄन्द्वि॒षो अंहां॑सि दुरि॒ता त॑रेम॒ ता त॑रेम॒ तवाव॑सा तरेम
verses.transliteration: áchā no mitramaho deva devā́n  ágne vócaḥ sumatíṃ ródasyoḥ  vīhí svastíṃ sukṣitíṃ divó nr̥̄́n  dviṣó áṃhāṃsi duritā́ tarema  tā́ tarema távā́vasā tarema

translation.text: O Agni, God with Mitra's might, call hither the favour of the Gods from earth and heaven. Bring weal from heaven, that men may dwell securely. May we o'ercome the foe's malign oppressions, may we o'ercome them, through thy help o'ercome them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ स क्षे॑षदृत॒पा ऋ॑ते॒जा उ॒रु ज्योति॑र्नशते देव॒युष्टे॑ यं त्वं मि॒त्रेण॒ वरु॑णः स॒जोषा॒ देव॒ पासि॒ त्यज॑सा॒ मर्त॒मंहः॑
verses.transliteration: ágne sá kṣeṣad r̥tapā́ r̥tejā́ḥ-  urú jyótir naśate devayúṣ ṭe  yáṃ tvám mitréṇa váruṇaḥ sajóṣāḥ-  déva pā́si tyájasā mártam áṃhaḥ

translation.text: TRUE, guardian of the Law, thy faithful servant wins ample light and dwells in peace, O Agni, Whom thou, as Varuṇa in accord with Mitra, guardest, O God, by banishing his trouble.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ई॒जे य॒ज्ञेभिः॑ शश॒मे शमी॑भिर्ऋ॒धद्वा॑राया॒ग्नये॑ ददाश ए॒वा च॒न तं य॒शसा॒मजु॑ष्टि॒र्नांहो॒ मर्तं॑ नशते॒ न प्रदृ॑प्तिः
verses.transliteration: ījé yajñébhiḥ śaśamé śámībhir  r̥dhádvārāyāgnáye dadāśa  evā́ caná táṃ yaśásām ájuṣṭir  nā́ṃho mártaṃ naśate ná prádr̥ptiḥ

translation.text: He hath paid sacrifices, toiled in worship, and offered gifts to wealth-increasing Agni. Him the displeasure of the famous moves not, outrage and scorn affect not such a mortal.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सूरो॒ न यस्य॑ दृश॒तिर॑रे॒पा भी॒मा यदेति॑ शुच॒तस्त॒ आ धीः हेष॑स्वतः शु॒रुधो॒ नायम॒क्तोः कुत्रा॑ चिद्र॒ण्वो व॑स॒तिर्व॑ने॒जाः
verses.transliteration: sū́ro ná yásya dr̥śatír arepā́ḥ-  bhīmā́ yád éti śucatás ta ā́ dhī́ḥ  héṣasvataḥ śurúdho nā́yám aktóḥ  kútrā cid raṇvó vasatír vanejā́ḥ

translation.text: Bright God, whose look is free from stain like Sûrya's, thou, swift, what time thou earnestly desirest, Hast gear to give us. Come with joy at evening, where, Child of Wood, thou mayest also tarry.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ति॒ग्मं चि॒देम॒ महि॒ वर्पो॑ अस्य॒ भस॒दश्वो॒ न य॑मसा॒न आ॒सा वि॒जेह॑मानः पर॒शुर्न जि॒ह्वां द्र॒विर्न द्रा॑वयति॒ दारु॒ धक्ष॑त्
verses.transliteration: tigmáṃ cid éma máhi várpo asya  bhásad áśvo ná yamasāná āsā́  vijéhamānaḥ paraśúr ná jihvā́ṃ  dravír ná drāvayati dā́ru dhákṣat

translation.text: Fierce is his gait and vast his wondrous body: he champeth like a horse with bit and bridle, And, darting forth his tongue, as 'twere a hatchet, burning the woods, smelteth them like a smelter.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स इदस्ते॑व॒ प्रति॑ धादसि॒ष्यञ्छिशी॑त॒ तेजोऽय॑सो॒ न धारा॑म् चि॒त्रध्र॑जतिरर॒तिर्यो अ॒क्तोर्वेर्न द्रु॒षद्वा॑ रघु॒पत्म॑जंहाः
verses.transliteration: sá íd ásteva práti dhād asiṣyáñ  -śíśīta téjó 'yaso ná dhā́rām  citrádhrajatir aratír yó aktór  vér ná druṣádvā raghupátmajaṃhāḥ

translation.text: Archer-like, fain toshoot, he sets his arrow, and whets his splendour like the edge of iron: The messenger of night with brilliant pathway, like a tree-roosting bird of rapid pinion.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स ईं॑ रे॒भो न प्रति॑ वस्त उ॒स्राः शो॒चिषा॑ रारपीति मि॒त्रम॑हाः नक्तं॒ य ई॑मरु॒षो यो दिवा॒ नॄनम॑र्त्यो अरु॒षो यो दिवा॒ नॄन्
verses.transliteration: sá īṃ rebhó ná práti vasta usrā́ḥ  śocíṣā rārapīti mitrámahāḥ  náktaṃ yá īm aruṣó yó dívā nr̥̄́n  ámartyo aruṣó yó dívā nr̥̄́n

translation.text: In beams of morn he clothes him like the singer, and bright as Mitra with his splendour crackles. Red in the night, by day the men's possession: red, he belongs to men by day, Immortal.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वो न यस्य॑ विध॒तो नवी॑नो॒द्वृषा॑ रु॒क्ष ओष॑धीषु नूनोत् घृणा॒ न यो ध्रज॑सा॒ पत्म॑ना॒ यन्ना रोद॑सी॒ वसु॑ना॒ दं सु॒पत्नी॑
verses.transliteration: divó ná yásya vidható návīnod  vŕ̥ṣā rukṣá óṣadhīṣu nūnot  ghŕ̥ṇā ná yó dhrájasā pátmanā yánn  ā́ ródasī vásunā dáṃ supátnī

translation.text: Like Heaven's when scattering beams his voice was uttered: among the plants the radiant Hero shouted, Who with his glow in rapid course came hither to fill both worlds, well-wedded Dames, with treasure.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धायो॑भिर्वा॒ यो युज्ये॑भिर॒र्कैर्वि॒द्युन्न द॑विद्यो॒त्स्वेभिः॒ शुष्मैः॑ शर्धो॑ वा॒ यो म॒रुतां॑ त॒तक्ष॑ ऋ॒भुर्न त्वे॒षो र॑भसा॒नो अ॑द्यौत्
verses.transliteration: dhā́yobhir vā yó yújyebhir arkaír  vidyún ná davidyot svébhiḥ śúṣmaiḥ  śárdho vā yó marútāṃ tatákṣa  r̥bhúr ná tveṣó rabhasānó adyaut

translation.text: Who, with supporting streams and rays that suit him, hath flashed like lightning with his native vigour. Like the deft Maker of the band of Maruts, the bright impetuous One hath shone refulgent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॑ होत॒र्मनु॑षो दे॒वता॑ता य॒ज्ञेभिः॑ सूनो सहसो॒ यजा॑सि ए॒वा नो॑ अ॒द्य स॑म॒ना स॑मा॒नानु॒शन्न॑ग्न उश॒तो य॑क्षि दे॒वान्
verses.transliteration: yáthā hotar mánuṣo devátātā  yajñébhiḥ sūno sahaso yájāsi  evā́ no adyá samanā́ samānā́n  uśánn agna uśató yakṣi devā́n

translation.text: As at man's service of the Gods, Invoker, thou, Son of Strength, dost sacrifice and worship, So bring for us to-day all Gods together, bring willingly the willing Gods, O Agni.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ वि॒भावा॑ च॒क्षणि॒र्न वस्तो॑र॒ग्निर्व॒न्दारु॒ वेद्य॒श्चनो॑ धात् वि॒श्वायु॒र्यो अ॒मृतो॒ मर्त्ये॑षूष॒र्भुद्भूदति॑थिर्जा॒तवे॑दाः
verses.transliteration: sá no vibhā́vā cakṣáṇir ná vástor  agnír vandā́ru védyaś cáno dhāt  viśvā́yur yó amŕ̥to mártyeṣu-  -uṣarbhúd bhū́d átithir jātávedāḥ

translation.text: May Agni, radiant Herald of the morning, meet to be known, accept our praise with favour. Dear to all life, mid mortal men Immortal, our guest, awake at dawn, is Jâtavedas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्यावो॒ न यस्य॑ प॒नय॒न्त्यभ्वं॒ भासां॑सि वस्ते॒ सूर्यो॒ न शु॒क्रः वि य इ॒नोत्य॒जरः॑ पाव॒कोऽश्न॑स्य चिच्छिश्नथत्पू॒र्व्याणि॑
verses.transliteration: dyā́vo ná yásya panáyanty ábhvam  bhā́sāṃsi vaste sū́ryo ná śukráḥ  ví yá inóty ajáraḥ pāvakó  áśnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyā́ṇi

translation.text: Whose might the very heavens regard with wonder: bright as the Sun he clothes himself with lustre. He who sends forth, Eternal Purifier, hath shattered e'en the ancient works of Aṣna.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒द्मा हि सू॑नो॒ अस्य॑द्म॒सद्वा॑ च॒क्रे अ॒ग्निर्ज॒नुषाज्मान्न॑म् स त्वं न॑ ऊर्जसन॒ ऊर्जं॑ धा॒ राजे॑व जेरवृ॒के क्षे॑ष्य॒न्तः
verses.transliteration: vadmā́ hí sūno ásy admasádvā  cakré agnír janúṣā́jmā́nnam  sá tváṃ na ūrjasana ū́rjaṃ dhāḥ-  rā́jeva jer avr̥ké kṣeṣy antáḥ

translation.text: Thou art a Singer, Son! our feast-companion: Agni at birth prepared his food and pathway. Therefore vouchsafe us strength, O Strength-bestower. Win like a King: foes trouble not thy dwelling.

verses.sanskrit_deva: निति॑क्ति॒ यो वा॑र॒णमन्न॒मत्ति॑ वा॒युर्न राष्ट्र्यत्ये॑त्य॒क्तून् तु॒र्याम॒ यस्त॑ आ॒दिशा॒मरा॑ती॒रत्यो॒ न ह्रुतः॒ पत॑तः परि॒ह्रुत्
verses.transliteration: nítikti yó vāraṇám ánnam átti  vāyúr ná rā́ṣṭry áty ety aktū́n  turyā́ma yás ta ādíśām árātīr  átyo ná hrútaḥ pátataḥ parihrút

translation.text: Even he who cats his firm hard food with swiftness,and overtakes the nights as Vâyu kingdoms. May we o'ercome those who resist thine orders, like a steed casting down the flying foemen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ सूर्यो॒ न भा॑नु॒मद्भि॑र॒र्कैरग्ने॑ त॒तन्थ॒ रोद॑सी॒ वि भा॒सा चि॒त्रो न॑य॒त्परि॒ तमां॑स्य॒क्तः शो॒चिषा॒ पत्म॑न्नौशि॒जो न दीय॑न्
verses.transliteration: ā́ sū́ryo ná bhānumádbhir arkaír  ágne tatántha ródasī ví bhāsā́  citró nayat pári támāṃsy aktáḥ  śocíṣā pátmann auśijó ná dī́yan

translation.text: Like Sûrya with his fulgent rays, O Agni, thou overspreadest both the worlds with splendour. Decked with bright colour he dispels the darkness, like Auṣija, with clear flame swifily flying.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां हि म॒न्द्रत॑ममर्कशो॒कैर्व॑वृ॒महे॒ महि॑ नः॒ श्रोष्य॑ग्ने इन्द्रं॒ न त्वा॒ शव॑सा दे॒वता॑ वा॒युं पृ॑णन्ति॒ राध॑सा॒ नृत॑माः
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ hí mandrátamam arkaśokaír  vavr̥máhe máhi naḥ śróṣy agne  índraṃ ná tvā śávasā devátā  vāyúm pr̥ṇanti rā́dhasā nŕ̥tamāḥ

translation.text: We have elected thee as most delightful for thy beams' glow: hear our great laud, O Agni. The best men praise thee as the peer of Indra in strength, mid Gods, like Viyu in thy bounty.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू नो॑ अग्नेऽवृ॒केभिः॑ स्व॒स्ति वेषि॑ रा॒यः प॒थिभिः॒ पर्ष्यंहः॑ ता सू॒रिभ्यो॑ गृण॒ते रा॑सि सु॒म्नं मदे॑म श॒तहि॑माः सु॒वीराः॑
verses.transliteration: nū́ no agne 'vr̥kébhiḥ svastí  véṣi rāyáḥ pathíbhiḥ párṣy áṃhaḥ  tā́ sūríbhyo gr̥ṇaté rāsi sumnám  mádema śatáhimāḥ suvī́rāḥ

translation.text: Now, Agni, on the tranquil paths of riches come to us for our weal: save us from sorrow. Grant chiefs and bard this boon. May we live happy, with hero children, through a hundred winters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हु॒वे वः॑ सू॒नुं सह॑सो॒ युवा॑न॒मद्रो॑घवाचं म॒तिभि॒र्यवि॑ष्ठम् य इन्व॑ति॒ द्रवि॑णानि॒ प्रचे॑ता वि॒श्ववा॑राणि पुरु॒वारो॑ अ॒ध्रुक्
verses.transliteration: huvé vaḥ sūnúṃ sáhaso yúvānam  ádroghavācam matíbhir yáviṣṭham  yá ínvati dráviṇāni prácetāḥ-  viśvávārāṇi puruvā́ro adhrúk

translation.text: I INVOCATE your Son of Strength, the Youthful, with hymns, the Youngest God, whose speech is guileless; Sage who sends wealth comprising every treasure, bringer of many boons, devoid of malice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वे वसू॑नि पुर्वणीक होतर्दो॒षा वस्तो॒रेरि॑रे य॒ज्ञिया॑सः क्षामे॑व॒ विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि॒ यस्मि॒न्त्सं सौभ॑गानि दधि॒रे पा॑व॒के
verses.transliteration: tvé vásūni purvaṇīka hotar  doṣā́ vástor érire yajñíyāsaḥ  kṣā́meva víśvā bhúvanāni yásmin  sáṃ saúbhagāni dadhiré pāvaké

translation.text: At eve and morn thy pious servants bring thee their precious gifts, O Priest of many aspects, On whom, the Purifier, all things living as on firm. ground their happiness have stablished.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं वि॒क्षु प्र॒दिवः॑ सीद आ॒सु क्रत्वा॑ र॒थीर॑भवो॒ वार्या॑णाम् अत॑ इनोषि विध॒ते चि॑कित्वो॒ व्या॑नु॒षग्जा॑तवेदो॒ वसू॑नि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ vikṣú pradívaḥ sīda āsú  krátvā rathī́r abhavo vā́ryāṇām  áta inoṣi vidhaté cikitvo  vy ā̀nuṣág jātavedo vásūni

translation.text: Thou from of old hast dwelt among these people, by mental power the charioteer of blessings. Hence sendest thou, O sapient Jâtavedas, to him who serves thee treasures in succession.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नः॒ सनु॑त्यो अभि॒दास॑दग्ने॒ यो अन्त॑रो मित्रमहो वनु॒ष्यात् तम॒जरे॑भि॒र्वृष॑भि॒स्तव॒ स्वैस्तपा॑ तपिष्ठ॒ तप॑सा॒ तप॑स्वान्
verses.transliteration: yó naḥ sánutyo abhidā́sad agne  yó ántaro mitramaho vanuṣyā́t  tám ajárebhir vŕ̥ṣabhis táva svaís  tápā tapiṣṭha tápasā tápasvān

translation.text: Agni, whoever secretly attacks us, the neighbour, thou with Mitra's might! who harms us, Burn him with thine own Steers for ever youthful, burning with burning heat, thou fiercest burner.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ य॒ज्ञेन॑ स॒मिधा॒ य उ॒क्थैर॒र्केभिः॑ सूनो सहसो॒ ददा॑शत् स मर्त्ये॑ष्वमृत॒ प्रचे॑ता रा॒या द्यु॒म्नेन॒ श्रव॑सा॒ वि भा॑ति
verses.transliteration: yás te yajñéna samídhā yá ukthaír  arkébhiḥ sūno sahaso dádāśat  sá mártyeṣv amr̥ta prácetāḥ-  rāyā́ dyumnéna śrávasā ví bhāti

translation.text: He who serves thee with sacrifice and fuel, with hymn, O Son of Strength, and chanted praises, Shines out, Immortal! in the midst of mortals, a sage, with wealth, with splendour and with glory.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स तत्कृ॑धीषि॒तस्तूय॑मग्ने॒ स्पृधो॑ बाधस्व॒ सह॑सा॒ सह॑स्वान् यच्छ॒स्यसे॒ द्युभि॑र॒क्तो वचो॑भि॒स्तज्जु॑षस्व जरि॒तुर्घोषि॒ मन्म॑
verses.transliteration: sá tát kr̥dhīṣitás tū́yam agne  spŕ̥dho bādhasva sáhasā sáhasvān  yác chasyáse dyúbhir aktó vácobhis  táj juṣasva jaritúr ghóṣi mánma

translation.text: Do this, O Agni, when we urge thee, quickly, triumphant in thy might subdue our foemen. When thou art praised with words and decked with brightness, accept this chanted hymn, the singer's worship.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒श्याम॒ तं काम॑मग्ने॒ तवो॒ती अ॒श्याम॑ र॒यिं र॑यिवः सु॒वीर॑म् अ॒श्याम॒ वाज॑म॒भि वा॒जय॑न्तो॒ऽश्याम॑ द्यु॒म्नम॑जरा॒जरं॑ ते
verses.transliteration: aśyā́ma táṃ kā́mam agne távotī́  aśyā́ma rayíṃ rayivaḥ suvī́ram  aśyā́ma vā́jam abhí vājáyanto  -aśyā́ma dyumnám ajarājáraṃ te

translation.text: Help us, that we may gain this wish, O Agni, gain riches, Wealthy One! with store of heroes. Desiring strength from thee may we be strengthened, and win, Eternal! thine eternal glory.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र नव्य॑सा॒ सह॑सः सू॒नुमच्छा॑ य॒ज्ञेन॑ गा॒तुमव॑ इ॒च्छमा॑नः वृ॒श्चद्व॑नं कृ॒ष्णया॑मं॒ रुश॑न्तं वी॒ती होता॑रं दि॒व्यं जि॑गाति
verses.transliteration: prá návyasā sáhasaḥ sūnúm áchā  yajñéna gātúm áva ichámānaḥ  vr̥ścádvanaṃ kr̥ṣṇáyāmaṃ rúśantaṃ  vītī́ hótāraṃ divyáṃ jigāti

translation.text: HE who seeks furtherance and grace to help him goes to the Son of Strength with newest worship, Calling the heavenly Priest to share the banquet, who rends the wood, bright, with his blackened pathway.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स श्वि॑ता॒नस्त॑न्य॒तू रो॑चन॒स्था अ॒जरे॑भि॒र्नान॑दद्भि॒र्यवि॑ष्ठः यः पा॑व॒कः पु॑रु॒तमः॑ पु॒रूणि॑ पृ॒थून्य॒ग्निर॑नु॒याति॒ भर्व॑न्
verses.transliteration: sá śvitānás tanyatū́ rocanasthā́ḥ-  ajárebhir nā́nadadbhir yáviṣṭhaḥ  yáḥ pāvakáḥ purutámaḥ purū́ṇi  pr̥thū́ny agnír anuyā́ti bhárvan

translation.text: White-hued and thundering he dwells in splendour, Most Youthful, with the loudvoiced and eternal- Agni, most variform, the Purifier, who follows crunching many ample forests.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि ते॒ विष्व॒ग्वात॑जूतासो अग्ने॒ भामा॑सः शुचे॒ शुच॑यश्चरन्ति तु॒वि॒म्र॒क्षासो॑ दि॒व्या नव॑ग्वा॒ वना॑ वनन्ति धृष॒ता रु॒जन्तः॑
verses.transliteration: ví te víṣvag vā́tajūtāso agne  bhā́māsaḥ śuce śúcayaś caranti  tuvimrakṣā́so divyā́ návagvāḥ-  vánā vananti dhr̥ṣatā́ rujántaḥ

translation.text: Incited by the wind thy flames, O Agni, move onward, Pure One! pure, in all directions. Thy most destructive heavenly Navagvas break the woods down and devastate them boldly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये ते॑ शु॒क्रासः॒ शुच॑यः शुचिष्मः॒ क्षां वप॑न्ति॒ विषि॑तासो॒ अश्वाः॑ अध॑ भ्र॒मस्त॑ उर्वि॒या वि भा॑ति या॒तय॑मानो॒ अधि॒ सानु॒ पृश्नेः॑
verses.transliteration: yé te śukrā́saḥ śúcayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ  kṣā́ṃ vápanti víṣitāso áśvāḥ  ádha bhramás ta urviyā́ ví bhāti  yātáyamāno ádhi sā́nu pŕ̥śneḥ

translation.text: Thy pure white horses from their bonds are loosened: O Radiant One, they shear the ground beneath them, And far and wide shines out thy flame, and flickers rapidly moving over earth's high ridges.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॑ जि॒ह्वा पा॑पतीति॒ प्र वृष्णो॑ गोषु॒युधो॒ नाशनिः॑ सृजा॒ना शूर॑स्येव॒ प्रसि॑तिः क्षा॒तिर॒ग्नेर्दु॒र्वर्तु॑र्भी॒मो द॑यते॒ वना॑नि
verses.transliteration: ádha jihvā́ pāpatīti prá vŕ̥ṣṇo  goṣuyúdho nā́śániḥ sr̥jānā́  śū́rasyeva prásitiḥ kṣātír agnér  durvártur bhīmó dayate vánāni

translation.text: Forth darts the Bull's tongue like the sharp stone weapon discharged by him who fights to win the cattle. Agni's fierce flame is like a hero's onset: dread and resistless he destroys the forests.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ भा॒नुना॒ पार्थि॑वानि॒ ज्रयां॑सि म॒हस्तो॒दस्य॑ धृष॒ता त॑तन्थ स बा॑ध॒स्वाप॑ भ॒या सहो॑भिः॒ स्पृधो॑ वनु॒ष्यन्व॒नुषो॒ नि जू॑र्व
verses.transliteration: ā́ bhānúnā pā́rthivāni jráyāṃsi  mahás todásya dhr̥ṣatā́ tatantha  sá bādhasvā́pa bhayā́ sáhobhiḥ-  spŕ̥dho vanuṣyán vanúṣo ní jūrva

translation.text: Thou with the sunlight of the great Impeller hast boldly over-spread the earth's expanses. So drive away with conquering might all perils. fighting out foemen burn up those who harm us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स चि॑त्र चि॒त्रं चि॒तय॑न्तम॒स्मे चित्र॑क्षत्र चि॒त्रत॑मं वयो॒धाम् च॒न्द्रं र॒यिं पु॑रु॒वीरं॑ बृ॒हन्तं॒ चन्द्र॑ च॒न्द्राभि॑र्गृण॒ते यु॑वस्व
verses.transliteration: sá citra citráṃ citáyantam asmé  cítrakṣatra citrátamaṃ vayodhā́m  candráṃ rayím puruvī́ram br̥hántaṃ  cándra candrā́bhir gr̥ṇaté yuvasva

translation.text: Wondrous! of wondrous power! give to the singer wealth wondrous, marked, most wonderful, lifegiving. Wealth bright, O Bright One, vast, with many heroes, give with thy bright flames to the man who lauds thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मू॒र्धानं॑ दि॒वो अ॑र॒तिं पृ॑थि॒व्या वै॑श्वान॒रमृ॒त आ जा॒तम॒ग्निम् क॒विं स॒म्राज॒मति॑थिं॒ जना॑नामा॒सन्ना पात्रं॑ जनयन्त दे॒वाः
verses.transliteration: mūrdhā́naṃ divó aratím pr̥thivyā́ḥ-  vaiśvānarám r̥tá ā́ jātám agním  kavíṃ samrā́jam átithiṃ jánānām  āsánn ā́ pā́traṃ janayanta devā́ḥ

translation.text: Him, messenger of earth and head of heaven, Agni Vaiṣvânara, born in holy Order, The Sage, the King, the guest of men, a vessel fit for their mouths, the Gods have generated.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नाभिं॑ य॒ज्ञानां॒ सद॑नं रयी॒णां म॒हामा॑हा॒वम॒भि सं न॑वन्त वै॒श्वा॒न॒रं र॒थ्य॑मध्व॒राणां॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॑ के॒तुं ज॑नयन्त दे॒वाः
verses.transliteration: nā́bhiṃ yajñā́nāṃ sádanaṃ rayīṇā́m  mahā́m āhāvám abhí sáṃ navanta  vaiśvānaráṃ rathyàm adhvarā́ṇāṃ  yajñásya ketúṃ janayanta devā́ḥ

translation.text: Him have they praised, mid-point of sacrifices, great cistern of libations, seat of riches. Vaiṣvânara, conveyer of oblations, ensign of worship, have the Gods engendered.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वद्विप्रो॑ जायते वा॒ज्य॑ग्ने॒ त्वद्वी॒रासो॑ अभिमाति॒षाहः॑ वैश्वा॑नर॒ त्वम॒स्मासु॑ धेहि॒ वसू॑नि राजन्त्स्पृह॒याय्या॑णि
verses.transliteration: tvád vípro jāyate vājy àgne  tvád vīrā́so abhimātiṣā́haḥ  vaíśvānara tvám asmā́su dhehi  vásūni rājan spr̥hayā́yyāṇi

translation.text: From thee, O Agni, springs the mighty singer, from thee come heroes who subdue the foeman. O King, Vaiṣvânara, bestow thou on us excellent treasures worthy to belonged fo r.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां विश्वे॑ अमृत॒ जाय॑मानं॒ शिशुं॒ न दे॒वा अ॒भि सं न॑वन्ते तव॒ क्रतु॑भिरमृत॒त्वमा॑य॒न्वैश्वा॑नर॒ यत्पि॒त्रोरदी॑देः
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ víśve amr̥ta jā́yamānaṃ  śíśuṃ ná devā́ abhí sáṃ navante  táva krátubhir amr̥tatvám āyan  vaíśvānara yát pitrór ádīdeḥ

translation.text: To thee, Immortal! when to life thou springest, all the Gods sing for joy as to their infant. They by thy mental powers were made immortal, Vaiṣvânara, when thou shonest from thy Parents.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वैश्वा॑नर॒ तव॒ तानि॑ व्र॒तानि॑ म॒हान्य॑ग्ने॒ नकि॒रा द॑धर्ष यज्जाय॑मानः पि॒त्रोरु॒पस्थेऽवि॑न्दः के॒तुं व॒युने॒ष्वह्ना॑म्
verses.transliteration: vaíśvānara táva tā́ni vratā́ni  mahā́ny agne nákir ā́ dadharṣa  yáj jā́yamānaḥ pitrór upásthe-  -ávindaḥ ketúṃ vayúneṣv áhnām

translation.text: Agni Vaiṣvânara, no one hath ever resisted these thy mighty ordinances, When thou, arising from thy Parents' bosom, foundest the light for days' appointed courses.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वै॒श्वा॒न॒रस्य॒ विमि॑तानि॒ चक्ष॑सा॒ सानू॑नि दि॒वो अ॒मृत॑स्य के॒तुना॑ तस्येदु॒ विश्वा॒ भुव॒नाधि॑ मू॒र्धनि॑ व॒या इ॑व रुरुहुः स॒प्त वि॒स्रुहः॑
verses.transliteration: vaiśvānarásya vímitāni cákṣasā  sā́nūni divó amŕ̥tasya ketúnā  tásyéd u víśvā bhúvanā́dhi mūrdháni  vayā́ iva ruruhuḥ saptá visrúhaḥ

translation.text: The summits of the heaven are traversed through and through by the Immortal's light, Vaiṣvânara's brilliancy. All creatures in existence rest upon his head. The Seven swift-flowing Streams have grown like branches forth,

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि यो रजां॒स्यमि॑मीत सु॒क्रतु॑र्वैश्वान॒रो वि दि॒वो रो॑च॒ना क॒विः परि॒ यो विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि पप्र॒थेऽद॑ब्धो गो॒पा अ॒मृत॑स्य रक्षि॒ता
verses.transliteration: ví yó rájāṃsy ámimīta sukrátur  vaiśvānaró ví divó rocanā́ kavíḥ  pári yó víśvā bhúvanāni paprathé  -ádabdho gopā́ amŕ̥tasya rakṣitā́

translation.text: Vaiṣvânara, who measured out the realms of air, Sage very wise who made the lucid spheres of heaven, The Undeceivable who spread out all the worlds, keeper is he and guard of immortality.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पृ॒क्षस्य॒ वृष्णो॑ अरु॒षस्य॒ नू सहः॒ प्र नु वो॑चं वि॒दथा॑ जा॒तवे॑दसः वै॒श्वा॒न॒राय॑ म॒तिर्नव्य॑सी॒ शुचिः॒ सोम॑ इव पवते॒ चारु॑र॒ग्नये॑
verses.transliteration: pr̥kṣásya vŕ̥ṣṇo aruṣásya nū́ sáhaḥ  prá nú vocaṃ vidáthā jātávedasaḥ  vaiśvānarā́ya matír návyasī śúciḥ  sóma iva pavate cā́rur agnáye

translation.text: AT Jâtavedas' holy gathering I will tell aloud the conquering might of the swift red-hued Steer. A pure and fresher hymn flows to Vaiṣvânara, even as for Agni lovely Soma is made pure.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स जाय॑मानः पर॒मे व्यो॑मनि व्र॒तान्य॒ग्निर्व्र॑त॒पा अ॑रक्षत व्य१॒॑न्तरि॑क्षममिमीत सु॒क्रतु॑र्वैश्वान॒रो म॑हि॒ना नाक॑मस्पृशत्
verses.transliteration: sá jā́yamānaḥ paramé vyòmani-  vratā́ny agnír vratapā́ arakṣata  vy àntárikṣam amimīta sukrátur  vaiśvānaró mahinā́ nā́kam aspr̥śat

translation.text: That Agni, when in loftiest heaven he sprang to life, Guardian of Holy Laws, kept and observed them well. Exceeding wise, he measured out the firmament. Vaiṣvânara attained to heaven by mightiness.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व्य॑स्तभ्ना॒द्रोद॑सी मि॒त्रो अद्भु॑तोऽन्त॒र्वाव॑दकृणो॒ज्ज्योति॑षा॒ तमः॑ वि चर्म॑णीव धि॒षणे॑ अवर्तयद्वैश्वान॒रो विश्व॑मधत्त॒ वृष्ण्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: vy àstabhnād ródasī mitró ádbhuto  -antarvā́vad akr̥ṇoj jyótiṣā támaḥ  ví cármaṇīva dhiṣáṇe avartayad  vaiśvānaró víśvam adhatta vŕ̥ṣṇyam

translation.text: Wonderful Mitra propped the heaven and earth apart, and covered and concealed the darkness with his light. He made the two bowls part asunder like two skins. Vaiṣvânara put forth all his creative power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒पामु॒पस्थे॑ महि॒षा अ॑गृभ्णत॒ विशो॒ राजा॑न॒मुप॑ तस्थुर्ऋ॒ग्मिय॑म् आ दू॒तो अ॒ग्निम॑भरद्वि॒वस्व॑तो वैश्वान॒रं मा॑त॒रिश्वा॑ परा॒वतः॑
verses.transliteration: apā́m upásthe mahiṣā́ agr̥bhṇata  víśo rā́jānam úpa tasthur r̥gmíyam  ā́ dūtó agním abharad vivásvato  vaiśvānarám mātaríśvā parāvátaḥ

translation.text: The Migbty seized him in the bosom of the floods: the people waited on the King who should be praised. As envoy of Vivasvan Mâtariṣvan brought Agni Vaiṣvânara hither from far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒गेयु॑गे विद॒थ्यं॑ गृ॒णद्भ्योऽग्ने॑ र॒यिं य॒शसं॑ धेहि॒ नव्य॑सीम् प॒व्येव॑ राजन्न॒घशं॑समजर नी॒चा नि वृ॑श्च व॒निनं॒ न तेज॑सा
verses.transliteration: yugé-yuge vidathyàṃ gr̥ṇádbhyaḥ-  -ágne rayíṃ yaśásaṃ dhehi návyasīm  pavyéva rājann agháśaṃsam ajara  nīcā́ ní vr̥śca vanínaṃ ná téjasā

translation.text: In every age bestow upon the singers wealth, worthy of holy synods, glorious, ever new. King, undecaying, as it were with sharpened bolt, smite down the sinner like a tree with lightningflash.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्माक॑मग्ने म॒घव॑त्सु धार॒याना॑मि क्ष॒त्रम॒जरं॑ सु॒वीर्य॑म् व॒यं ज॑येम श॒तिनं॑ सह॒स्रिणं॒ वैश्वा॑नर॒ वाज॑मग्ने॒ तवो॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: asmā́kam agne maghávatsu dhāraya-  -ánāmi kṣatrám ajáraṃ suvī́ryam  vayáṃ jayema śatínaṃ sahasríṇaṃ  vaíśvānara vā́jam agne távotíbhiḥ

translation.text: Do thou bestow, O Agni, on our wealthy chiefs, rule, with good heroes, undecaying, bending not. So may we win for us strength. O Vaiṣvânara, hundredfold, thousandfold, O Agni, by thy help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अद॑ब्धेभि॒स्तव॑ गो॒पाभि॑रिष्टे॒ऽस्माकं॑ पाहि त्रिषधस्थ सू॒रीन् रक्षा॑ च नो द॒दुषां॒ शर्धो॑ अग्ने॒ वैश्वा॑नर॒ प्र च॑ तारीः॒ स्तवा॑नः
verses.transliteration: ádabdhebhis táva gopā́bhir iṣṭe  -asmā́kam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrī́n  rákṣā ca no dadúṣāṃ śárdho agne  vaíśvānara prá ca tārī stávānaḥ

translation.text: O thou who dwellest in three places, Helper, keep with effective guards our princely patrons. Keep our band, Agni, who have brought thee presents. Lengthen their lives, Vaiṣvânara, when lauded.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अह॑श्च कृ॒ष्णमह॒रर्जु॑नं च॒ वि व॑र्तेते॒ रज॑सी वे॒द्याभिः॑ वै॒श्वा॒न॒रो जाय॑मानो॒ न राजावा॑तिर॒ज्ज्योति॑षा॒ग्निस्तमां॑सि
verses.transliteration: áhaś ca kr̥ṣṇám áhar árjunaṃ ca  ví vartete rájasī vedyā́bhiḥ  vaiśvānaró jā́yamāno ná rā́jā-  -ávātiraj jyótiṣāgnís támāṃsi

translation.text: ONE half of day is dark, and bright the other: both atmospheres move on by sage devices. Agni Vaiṣvânara, when born as Sovran, hath with his lustre overcome the darkness.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नाहं तन्तुं॒ न वि जा॑ना॒म्योतुं॒ न यं वय॑न्ति सम॒रेऽत॑मानाः कस्य॑ स्वित्पु॒त्र इ॒ह वक्त्वा॑नि प॒रो व॑दा॒त्यव॑रेण पि॒त्रा
verses.transliteration: nā́háṃ tántuṃ ná ví jānāmy ótuṃ  ná yáṃ váyanti samaré 'tamānāḥ  kásya svit putrá ihá váktvāni  paró vadāty ávareṇa pitrā́

translation.text: I know not either warp or woof, I know not the web they weave when moving to the contest. Whose son shall here speak words that must be spoken without assistance from the Father near him?

verses.sanskrit_deva: स इत्तन्तुं॒ स वि जा॑ना॒त्योतुं॒ स वक्त्वा॑न्यृतु॒था व॑दाति य ईं॒ चिके॑तद॒मृत॑स्य गो॒पा अ॒वश्चर॑न्प॒रो अ॒न्येन॒ पश्य॑न्
verses.transliteration: sá ít tántuṃ sá ví jānāty ótuṃ  sá váktvāny r̥tuthā́ vadāti  yá īṃ cíketad amŕ̥tasya gopā́ḥ-  aváś cáran paró anyéna páśyan

translation.text: For both the warp and woof he understandeth, and in due time shall speak what should be spoken, Who knoweth as the immortal world's Protector, descending, seeing with no aid from other.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं होता॑ प्रथ॒मः पश्य॑ते॒ममि॒दं ज्योति॑र॒मृतं॒ मर्त्ये॑षु अ॒यं स ज॑ज्ञे ध्रु॒व आ निष॒त्तोऽम॑र्त्यस्त॒न्वा॒३॒॑ वर्ध॑मानः
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ hótā prathamáḥ páśyatemám  idáṃ jyótir amŕ̥tam mártyeṣu  ayáṃ sá jajñe dhruvá ā́ níṣattaḥ-  -ámartyas tanvā̀ várdhamānaḥ

translation.text: He is the Priest, the first of all: behold him. Mid mortal men he is the light immortal. Here was he born, firm-seated in his station Immortal, ever waxing in his body.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ध्रु॒वं ज्योति॒र्निहि॑तं दृ॒शये॒ कं मनो॒ जवि॑ष्ठं प॒तय॑त्स्व॒न्तः विश्वे॑ दे॒वाः सम॑नसः॒ सके॑ता॒ एकं॒ क्रतु॑म॒भि वि य॑न्ति सा॒धु
verses.transliteration: dhruváṃ jyótir níhitaṃ dr̥śáye kám  máno jáviṣṭham patáyatsv antáḥ  víśve devā́ḥ sámanasaḥ sáketāḥ-  ékaṃ krátum abhí ví yanti sādhú

translation.text: A firm light hath been set for men to look on: among all things that fly the mind is swiftest. All Gods of one accord, with one intention, move unobstructed to a single purpose.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि मे॒ कर्णा॑ पतयतो॒ वि चक्षु॒र्वी॒३॒॑दं ज्योति॒र्हृद॑य॒ आहि॑तं॒ यत् वि मे॒ मन॑श्चरति दू॒रआ॑धीः॒ किं स्वि॑द्व॒क्ष्यामि॒ किमु॒ नू म॑निष्ये
verses.transliteration: ví me kárṇā patayato ví cákṣur  vī̀dáṃ jyótir hŕ̥daya ā́hitaṃ yát  ví me mánaś carati dūráādhīḥ  kíṃ svid vakṣyā́mi kím u nū́ maniṣye

translation.text: Mine ears unclose to hear, mine eye to see him; the light that harbours in my spirit broadens. Far roams my mind whose thoughts are in the distance. What shall I speak, what shall I now imagine?

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अ॑नमस्यन्भिया॒नास्त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ तम॑सि तस्थि॒वांस॑म् वै॒श्वा॒न॒रो॑ऽवतू॒तये॒ नोऽम॑र्त्योऽवतू॒तये॑ नः
verses.transliteration: víśve devā́ anamasyan bhiyānā́s  tvā́m agne támasi tasthivā́ṃsam  vaiśvānarò 'vatūtáye naḥ-  -ámartyo 'vatūtáye naḥ

translation.text: All the Gods bowed them down in fear before thee, Agni, when thou wast dwelling in the darkness. Vaiṣvânara be gracious to assist us, may the Immortal favour us and help us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रो वो॑ म॒न्द्रं दि॒व्यं सु॑वृ॒क्तिं प्र॑य॒ति य॒ज्ञे अ॒ग्निम॑ध्व॒रे द॑धिध्वम् पु॒र उ॒क्थेभिः॒ स हि नो॑ वि॒भावा॑ स्वध्व॒रा क॑रति जा॒तवे॑दाः
verses.transliteration: puró vo mandráṃ divyáṃ suvr̥ktím  prayatí yajñé agním adhvaré dadhidhvam  purá ukthébhiḥ sá hí no vibhā́vā  svadhvarā́ karati jātávedāḥ

translation.text: INSTALL at sacrifice, while the rite advances, your pleasant, heavenly Agni, meet for praises. With hymns-for he illumines us-install him. He, Jâtavedas, makes our rites successful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ द्युमः पुर्वणीक होत॒रग्ने॑ अ॒ग्निभि॒र्मनु॑ष इधा॒नः स्तोमं॒ यम॑स्मै म॒मते॑व शू॒षं घृ॒तं न शुचि॑ म॒तयः॑ पवन्ते
verses.transliteration: tám u dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotar  ágne agníbhir mánuṣa idhānáḥ  stómaṃ yám asmai mamáteva śūṣáṃ  ghr̥táṃ ná śúci matáyaḥ pavante

translation.text: Hear this laud, Radiant Priest of many aspects, O Agni with the fires of man enkindled, Laud which bards send forth pure as sacred butter, strength to this man, as 'twere for selfadvantage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पी॒पाय॒ स श्रव॑सा॒ मर्त्ये॑षु॒ यो अ॒ग्नये॑ द॒दाश॒ विप्र॑ उ॒क्थैः चि॒त्राभि॒स्तमू॒तिभि॑श्चि॒त्रशो॑चिर्व्र॒जस्य॑ सा॒ता गोम॑तो दधाति
verses.transliteration: pīpā́ya sá śrávasā mártyeṣu  yó agnáye dadā́śa vípra ukthaíḥ  citrā́bhis tám ūtíbhiś citráśocir  vrajásya sātā́ gómato dadhāti

translation.text: Mid mortal men that singer thrives in glory who offers gifts with hymns of praise to Agni, And the God, wondrous bright, with wondrous succours helps him to win a stable filled with cattle.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यः प॒प्रौ जाय॑मान उ॒र्वी दू॑रे॒दृशा॑ भा॒सा कृ॒ष्णाध्वा॑ अध॑ ब॒हु चि॒त्तम॒ ऊर्म्या॑यास्ति॒रः शो॒चिषा॑ ददृशे पाव॒कः
verses.transliteration: ā́ yáḥ papraú jā́yamāna urvī́  dūredŕ̥śā bhāsā́ kr̥ṣṇā́dhvā  ádha bahú cit táma ū́rmyāyās  tiráḥ śocíṣā dadr̥śe pāvakáḥ

translation.text: He, at his birth, whose path is black behind him, filled heaven and earth with far-apparent splendour: And he himself hath been. through night's thick darkness, made manifest by light, the Purifier.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू न॑श्चि॒त्रं पु॑रु॒वाजा॑भिरू॒ती अग्ने॑ र॒यिं म॒घव॑द्भ्यश्च धेहि ये राध॑सा॒ श्रव॑सा॒ चात्य॒न्यान्त्सु॒वीर्ये॑भिश्चा॒भि सन्ति॒ जना॑न्
verses.transliteration: nū́ naś citrám puruvā́jābhir ūtī́  ágne rayím maghávadbhyaś ca dhehi  yé rā́dhasā śrávasā cā́ty anyā́n  suvī́ryebhiś cābhí sánti jánān

translation.text: With thy most mighty aid, confer, O Agni, wonderful wealth on us and on our princes, Who stand preeminent, surpassing others in liberal gifts, in fame, and hero virtues.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मं य॒ज्ञं चनो॑ धा अग्न उ॒शन्यं त॑ आसा॒नो जु॑हु॒ते ह॒विष्मा॑न् भ॒रद्वा॑जेषु दधिषे सुवृ॒क्तिमवी॒र्वाज॑स्य॒ गध्य॑स्य सा॒तौ
verses.transliteration: imáṃ yajñáṃ cáno dhā agna uśán  yáṃ ta āsānó juhuté havíṣmān  bharádvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvr̥ktím  ávīr vā́jasya gádhyasya sātaú

translation.text: Agni, accept this sacrifice with gladness, which, seated here, the worshipper presenteth. Fair hymns hadst thou among the Bharadvâjas, and holpest them to gain abundant vigour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि द्वेषां॑सीनु॒हि व॒र्धयेळां॒ मदे॑म श॒तहि॑माः सु॒वीराः॑
verses.transliteration: ví dvéṣāṃsīnuhí vardháyéḷām  mádema śatáhimāḥ suvī́rāḥ

translation.text: Scatter our foes, increase our store. May we he glad a hundred winters with brave sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यज॑स्व होतरिषि॒तो यजी॑या॒नग्ने॒ बाधो॑ म॒रुतां॒ न प्रयु॑क्ति आ नो॑ मि॒त्रावरु॑णा॒ नास॑त्या॒ द्यावा॑ हो॒त्राय॑ पृथि॒वी व॑वृत्याः
verses.transliteration: yájasva hotar iṣitó yájīyān  ágne bā́dho marútāṃ ná práyukti  ā́ no mitrā́váruṇā nā́satyā  dyā́vā hotrā́ya pr̥thivī́ vavr̥tyāḥ

translation.text: EAGERLY Sacrifice thou, most skilful, Agni! Priest, pressing on as if the Maruts sent thee. To our oblation bring the two Nâsatyas, Mitra and Varuṇa and Earth and Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं होता॑ म॒न्द्रत॑मो नो अ॒ध्रुग॒न्तर्दे॒वो वि॒दथा॒ मर्त्ये॑षु पा॒व॒कया॑ जु॒ह्वा॒३॒॑ वह्नि॑रा॒साग्ने॒ यज॑स्व त॒न्वं१॒॑ तव॒ स्वाम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hótā mandrátamo no adhrúg  antár devó vidáthā mártyeṣu  pāvakáyā juhvā̀ váhnir āsā́-  -ágne yájasva tanvàṃ táva svā́m

translation.text: Thou art our guileless, most delightful Herald, the God, among mankind, of holy synods. A Priest with purifying tongue, O Agni, sacrifice with thy mouth to thine own body.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धन्या॑ चि॒द्धि त्वे धि॒षणा॒ वष्टि॒ प्र दे॒वाञ्जन्म॑ गृण॒ते यज॑ध्यै वेपि॑ष्ठो॒ अङ्गि॑रसां॒ यद्ध॒ विप्रो॒ मधु॑ च्छ॒न्दो भन॑ति रे॒भ इ॒ष्टौ
verses.transliteration: dhányā cid dhí tvé dhiṣáṇā váṣṭi  prá devā́ñ jánma gr̥ṇaté yájadhyai  vépiṣṭho áṅgirasāṃ yád dha vípro  mádhu chandó bhánati rebhá iṣṭaú

translation.text: For even the blessed longing that is in thee would bring the Gods down to the singer's worship, When the Angirases' sagest Sage, the Poet, sings the sweet measure at the solemn service.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अदि॑द्युत॒त्स्वपा॑को वि॒भावाग्ने॒ यज॑स्व॒ रोद॑सी उरू॒ची आ॒युं न यं नम॑सा रा॒तह॑व्या अ॒ञ्जन्ति॑ सुप्र॒यसं॒ पञ्च॒ जनाः॑
verses.transliteration: ádidyutat sv ápāko vibhā́vā-  -ágne yájasva ródasī urūcī́  āyúṃ ná yáṃ námasā rātáhavyāḥ-  añjánti suprayásam páñca jánāḥ

translation.text: Bright hath he beamed, the wise, the far-refulgent. Worship the two widespreading Worlds, O Agni, Whom as the Living One rich in oblations the Five Tribes, bringing gifts, adorn with homage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृ॒ञ्जे ह॒ यन्नम॑सा ब॒र्हिर॒ग्नावया॑मि॒ स्रुग्घृ॒तव॑ती सुवृ॒क्तिः अम्य॑क्षि॒ सद्म॒ सद॑ने पृथि॒व्या अश्रा॑यि य॒ज्ञः सूर्ये॒ न चक्षुः॑
verses.transliteration: vr̥ñjé ha yán námasā barhír agnā́v  áyāmi srúg ghr̥távatī suvr̥ktíḥ  ámyakṣi sádma sádane pr̥thivyā́ḥ-  áśrāyi yajñáḥ sū́rye ná cákṣuḥ

translation.text: When I with reverence clip the grass for Agni, when the trimmed ladle, fullof oil, is lifted, Firm on the seat of earth is based the altar: eye-like, the sacrifice is directed Sun-ward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द॒श॒स्या नः॑ पुर्वणीक होतर्दे॒वेभि॑रग्ने अ॒ग्निभि॑रिधा॒नः रा॒यः सू॑नो सहसो वावसा॒ना अति॑ स्रसेम वृ॒जनं॒ नांहः॑
verses.transliteration: daśasyā́ naḥ purvaṇīka hotar  devébhir agne agníbhir idhānáḥ  rāyáḥ sūno sahaso vāvasānā́ḥ-  áti srasema vr̥jánaṃ nā́ṃhaḥ

translation.text: Enrich us, O thou Priest of many aspects, with the Gods, Agni, with thy fires, enkindled. O Son of Strength, clad in the robe of riches, may we escape from woe as from a prison.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मध्ये॒ होता॑ दुरो॒णे ब॒र्हिषो॒ राळ॒ग्निस्तो॒दस्य॒ रोद॑सी॒ यज॑ध्यै अ॒यं स सू॒नुः सह॑स ऋ॒तावा॑ दू॒रात्सूर्यो॒ न शो॒चिषा॑ ततान
verses.transliteration: mádhye hótā duroṇé barhíṣo rā́ḷ  agnís todásya ródasī yájadhyai  ayáṃ sá sūnúḥ sáhasa r̥tā́vā  dūrā́t sū́ryo ná śocíṣā tatāna

translation.text: KING of trimmed grass, Herald within the dwelling, may Agni worship the Impeller's World-halves. He, Son of Strength, the Holy, from a distance hath spread himself abroad with light like Sûrya.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यस्मि॒न्त्वे स्वपा॑के यजत्र॒ यक्ष॑द्राजन्त्स॒र्वता॑तेव॒ नु द्यौः त्रि॒ष॒धस्थ॑स्तत॒रुषो॒ न जंहो॑ ह॒व्या म॒घानि॒ मानु॑षा॒ यज॑ध्यै
verses.transliteration: ā́ yásmin tvé sv ápāke yajatra  yákṣad rājan sarvátāteva nú dyaúḥ  triṣadhásthas tatarúṣo ná jáṃho  havyā́ maghā́ni mā́nuṣā yájadhyai

translation.text: In thee, most wise, shall Dyaus, for full perfection, King! Holy One! pronounce the call to worship. Found in three places, like the Speeder's footstep, come to present men's riches as oblations!

verses.sanskrit_deva: तेजि॑ष्ठा॒ यस्या॑र॒तिर्व॑ने॒राट् तो॒दो अध्व॒न्न वृ॑धसा॒नो अ॑द्यौत् अ॒द्रो॒घो न द्र॑वि॒ता चे॑तति॒ त्मन्नम॑र्त्योऽव॒र्त्र ओष॑धीषु
verses.transliteration: téjiṣṭhā yásyāratír vanerā́ṭ  todó ádhvan ná vr̥dhasānó adyaut  adroghó ná dravitā́ cetati tmánn  ámartyo 'vartrá óṣadhīṣu

translation.text: Whose blaze most splendid, sovran in the forest, shines waxing on his way like the – Impeller. He knows himself, like as a guileless smelter, not to be stayed among the plants, Immortal.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सास्माके॑भिरे॒तरी॒ न शू॒षैर॒ग्निः ष्ट॑वे॒ दम॒ आ जा॒तवे॑दाः द्र्व॑न्नो व॒न्वन्क्रत्वा॒ नार्वो॒स्रः पि॒तेव॑ जार॒यायि॑ य॒ज्ञैः
verses.transliteration: sā́smā́kebhir etárī ná śūṣaír  agní ṣṭave dáma ā́ jātávedāḥ  drvànno vanván krátvā nā́rvā-  -usráḥ pitéva jārayā́yi yajñaíḥ

translation.text: Our friends extol him like a steed for vigour even Agni in the dwelling, Jâtave~as. Trce-fed, he fights with power as doth a champion, like Dawn's Sire to be praised with sacrifices.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॑ स्मास्य पनयन्ति॒ भासो॒ वृथा॒ यत्तक्ष॑दनु॒याति॑ पृ॒थ्वीम् स॒द्यो यः स्य॒न्द्रो विषि॑तो॒ धवी॑यानृ॒णो न ता॒युरति॒ धन्वा॑ राट्
verses.transliteration: ádha smāsya panayanti bhā́so  vŕ̥thā yát tákṣad anuyā́ti pr̥thvī́m  sadyó yáḥ syandró víṣito dhávīyān  r̥ṇó ná tāyúr áti dhánvā rāṭ

translation.text: Men wonder at his shining glows when, paring the woods with case, o'er the broad earth he goeth, And, like a rushing flood, loosed quickly, burneth, swift as a guilty thief, o'er desert places.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वं नो॑ अर्व॒न्निदा॑या॒ विश्वे॑भिरग्ने अ॒ग्निभि॑रिधा॒नः वेषि॑ रा॒यो वि या॑सि दु॒च्छुना॒ मदे॑म श॒तहि॑माः सु॒वीराः॑
verses.transliteration: sá tváṃ no arvan nídāyāḥ-  víśvebhir agne agníbhir idhānáḥ  véṣi rāyó ví yāsi duchúnāḥ-  mádema śatáhimāḥ suvī́rāḥ

translation.text: So mighty thou protectest us from slander, O Champion, Agni! with all fires enkindled. Bring opulence and drive away affliction. May brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वद्विश्वा॑ सुभग॒ सौभ॑गा॒न्यग्ने॒ वि य॑न्ति व॒निनो॒ न व॒याः श्रु॒ष्टी र॒यिर्वाजो॑ वृत्र॒तूर्ये॑ दि॒वो वृ॒ष्टिरीड्यो॑ री॒तिर॒पाम्
verses.transliteration: tvád víśvā subhaga saúbhagāni-  ágne ví yanti vaníno ná vayā́ḥ  śruṣṭī́ rayír vā́jo vr̥tratū́rye  divó vr̥ṣṭír ī́ḍyo rītír apā́m

translation.text: FROM thee, as branches from a tree, O Agni, from thee, Auspicious God! spring all our blessings- Wealth swiftly, strength in battle with our foemen, the rain besought of heaven, the flow of waters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं भगो॑ न॒ आ हि रत्न॑मि॒षे परि॑ज्मेव क्षयसि द॒स्मव॑र्चाः अग्ने॑ मि॒त्रो न बृ॑ह॒त ऋ॒तस्यासि॑ क्ष॒त्ता वा॒मस्य॑ देव॒ भूरेः॑
verses.transliteration: tvám bhágo na ā́ hí rátnam iṣé  párijmeva kṣayasi dasmávarcāḥ  ágne mitró ná br̥hatá r̥tásya-  -ási kṣattā́ vāmásya deva bhū́reḥ

translation.text: Thou art our Bhaga to send wealth thou dwellest, like circumambient air, with wondrous splendour. Friend art thou of the lofty Law, like Mitra, Controller, Agni! God! of many a blessing.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स सत्प॑तिः॒ शव॑सा हन्ति वृ॒त्रमग्ने॒ विप्रो॒ वि प॒णेर्भ॑र्ति॒ वाज॑म् यं त्वं प्र॑चेत ऋतजात रा॒या स॒जोषा॒ नप्त्रा॒पां हि॒नोषि॑
verses.transliteration: sá sátpatiḥ śávasā hanti vr̥trám  ágne vípro ví paṇér bharti vā́jam  yáṃ tvám praceta r̥tajāta rāyā́  sajóṣā náptrāpā́ṃ hinóṣi

translation.text: Agni! the hero slays with might his foeman; the singer bears away the Paṇi's booty- Even he whom thou, Sage, born in Law, incitest by wealth, accordant with the Child of Waters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ सूनो सहसो गी॒र्भिरु॒क्थैर्य॒ज्ञैर्मर्तो॒ निशि॑तिं वे॒द्यान॑ट् विश्वं॒ स दे॑व॒ प्रति॒ वार॑मग्ने ध॒त्ते धा॒न्यं१॒॑ पत्य॑ते वस॒व्यैः॑
verses.transliteration: yás te sūno sahaso gīrbhír ukthaír  yajñaír márto níśitiṃ vedyā́naṭ  víśvaṃ sá deva práti vā́ram agne  dhatté dhānyàm pátyate vasavyaìḥ

translation.text: The man who, Son of Strength! with sacrifices, hymns, lauds, attracts thy fervour to the altar, Enjoys each precious thing, O God, O Agni, gains wealth of corn and is the lord of treasures.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता नृभ्य॒ आ सौ॑श्रव॒सा सु॒वीराग्ने॑ सूनो सहसः पु॒ष्यसे॑ धाः कृ॒णोषि॒ यच्छव॑सा॒ भूरि॑ प॒श्वो वयो॒ वृका॑या॒रये॒ जसु॑रये
verses.transliteration: tā́ nŕ̥bhya ā́ sauśravasā́ suvī́rā-  -ágne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyáse dhāḥ  kr̥ṇóṣi yác chávasā bhū́ri paśvó  váyo vŕ̥kāyāráye jásuraye

translation.text: Grant, Son of Strength, to men for their subsistence such things as bring high fame and hero children. For thou with might givest much food in cattle even to the wicked wolf when he is hungry.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒द्मा सू॑नो सहसो नो॒ विहा॑या॒ अग्ने॑ तो॒कं तन॑यं वा॒जि नो॑ दाः विश्वा॑भिर्गी॒र्भिर॒भि पू॒र्तिम॑श्यां॒ मदे॑म श॒तहि॑माः सु॒वीराः॑
verses.transliteration: vadmā́ sūno sahaso no víhāyāḥ-  ágne tokáṃ tánayaṃ vājí no dāḥ  víśvābhir gīrbhír abhí pūrtím aśyām  mádema śatáhimāḥ suvī́rāḥ

translation.text: Eloquent, Son of Strength, Most Mighty, Agni, vouchsafe us seed and offspring, full of vigour. May I by all my songs obtain abundance. May brave sons gladden us through a hundred winters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्ना यो मर्त्यो॒ दुवो॒ धियं॑ जु॒जोष॑ धी॒तिभिः॑ भस॒न्नु ष प्र पू॒र्व्य इषं॑ वुरी॒ताव॑से
verses.transliteration: agnā́ yó mártyo dúvo  dhíyaṃ jujóṣa dhītíbhiḥ  bhásan nú ṣá prá pūrvyáḥ-  íṣaṃ vurītā́vase

translation.text: WHOSO to Agni hath endeared his thought and service by his hymns, That mortal cats before the rest, and finds sufficiency of food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निरिद्धि प्रचे॑ता अ॒ग्निर्वे॒धस्त॑म॒ ऋषिः॑ अ॒ग्निं होता॑रमीळते य॒ज्ञेषु॒ मनु॑षो॒ विशः॑
verses.transliteration: agnír íd dhí prácetāḥ-  agnír vedhástama ŕ̥ṣiḥ  agníṃ hótāram īḷate  yajñéṣu mánuṣo víśaḥ

translation.text: Agni, in truth, is passing wise, most skilled in ordering, a Seer. At sacrifices Manus' sons glorify Agni as their Priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नाना॒ ह्य१॒॑ग्नेऽव॑से॒ स्पर्ध॑न्ते॒ रायो॑ अ॒र्यः तूर्व॑न्तो॒ दस्यु॑मा॒यवो॑ व्र॒तैः सीक्ष॑न्तो अव्र॒तम्
verses.transliteration: nā́nā hy àgné 'vase  spárdhante rā́yo aryáḥ  tū́rvanto dásyum āyávo  vrataíḥ sī́kṣanto avratám

translation.text: The foeman's wealth in many a place, Agni, is emulous to help. Men fight the fiend, and seek by rites to overcome the riteless foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर॒प्सामृ॑ती॒षहं॑ वी॒रं द॑दाति॒ सत्प॑तिम् यस्य॒ त्रस॑न्ति॒ शव॑सः सं॒चक्षि॒ शत्र॑वो भि॒या
verses.transliteration: agnír apsā́m r̥tīṣáhaṃ  vīráṃ dadāti sátpatim  yásya trásanti śávasaḥ  saṃcákṣi śátravo bhiyā́

translation.text: Agni bestows the hero chief, winner of waters, firm in fray. Soon as they look upon his might his enemies tremble in alarm.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्हि वि॒द्मना॑ नि॒दो दे॒वो मर्त॑मुरु॒ष्यति॑ स॒हावा॒ यस्यावृ॑तो र॒यिर्वाजे॒ष्ववृ॑तः
verses.transliteration: agnír hí vidmánā nidó  devó mártam uruṣyáti  sahā́vā yásyā́vr̥to  rayír vā́jeṣv ávr̥taḥ

translation.text: For with his wisdom Agni, God, protects the mortal from reproach, Whose conquering wealth is never checked, is never checked in deeds of might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अच्छा॑ नो मित्रमहो देव दे॒वानग्ने॒ वोचः॑ सुम॒तिं रोद॑स्योः वी॒हि स्व॒स्तिं सु॑क्षि॒तिं दि॒वो नॄन्द्वि॒षो अंहां॑सि दुरि॒ता त॑रेम॒ ता त॑रेम॒ तवाव॑सा तरेम
verses.transliteration: áchā no mitramaho deva devā́n  ágne vócaḥ sumatíṃ ródasyoḥ  vīhí svastíṃ sukṣitíṃ divó nr̥̄́n  dviṣó áṃhāṃsi duritā́ tarema  tā́ tarema távā́vasā tarema

translation.text: O Agni, God with Mitra's might call hither the favour of the Gods from earth and heaven. Bring weal from heaven that men may dwell securely. May we o'ercome the foe's malign oppressions, may we o'ercome them, through thy help o'ercome them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ममू॒ षु वो॒ अति॑थिमुष॒र्बुधं॒ विश्वा॑सां वि॒शां पति॑मृञ्जसे गि॒रा वेतीद्दि॒वो ज॒नुषा॒ कच्चि॒दा शुचि॒र्ज्योक्चि॑दत्ति॒ गर्भो॒ यदच्यु॑तम्
verses.transliteration: imám ū ṣú vo átithim uṣarbúdhaṃ  víśvāsāṃ viśā́m pátim r̥ñjase girā́  vétī́d divó janúṣā kác cid ā́ śúcir  jyók cid atti gárbho yád ácyutam

translation.text: WITH this my song I strive to reach this guest of yours, who wakes at early morn, the Lord of all the tribes. Each time he comes from heaven, the Pure One from of old: from ancient days the Child cats everlasting food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मि॒त्रं न यं सुधि॑तं॒ भृग॑वो द॒धुर्वन॒स्पता॒वीड्य॑मू॒र्ध्वशो॑चिषम् स त्वं सुप्री॑तो वी॒तह॑व्ये अद्भुत॒ प्रश॑स्तिभिर्महयसे दि॒वेदि॑वे
verses.transliteration: mitráṃ ná yáṃ súdhitam bhŕ̥gavo dadhúr  vánaspátāv ī́ḍyam ūrdhváśociṣam  sá tváṃ súprīto vītáhavye adbhuta  práśastibhir mahayase divé-dive

translation.text: Whom, well-disposed, the Bhr̥igus stablished as a Friend, whom men must glorify, high-flaming in the wood. As such, most friendly, thou art every day extolled in lauds by Vîtahavya, O thou wondrous God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वं दक्ष॑स्यावृ॒को वृ॒धो भू॑र॒र्यः पर॒स्यान्त॑रस्य॒ तरु॑षः रा॒यः सू॑नो सहसो॒ मर्त्ये॒ष्वा छ॒र्दिर्य॑च्छ वी॒तह॑व्याय स॒प्रथो॑ भ॒रद्वा॑जाय स॒प्रथः॑
verses.transliteration: sá tváṃ dákṣasyāvr̥kó vr̥dhó bhūr  aryáḥ párasyā́ntarasya táruṣaḥ  rāyáḥ sūno sahaso mártyeṣv~ā́  chardír yacha vītáhavyāya saprátho  bharádvājāya sapráthaḥ

translation.text: Be thou the foeless helper of the skilful man, subduer of the enemy near or far away. Bestow a wealthy home on men, O Son of Strength. Give Vîtahavya riches spreading far and wide, give Bharadvâja wide-spread wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्यु॒ता॒नं वो॒ अति॑थिं॒ स्व॑र्णरम॒ग्निं होता॑रं॒ मनु॑षः स्वध्व॒रम् विप्रं॒ न द्यु॒क्षव॑चसं सुवृ॒क्तिभि॑र्हव्य॒वाह॑मर॒तिं दे॒वमृ॑ञ्जसे
verses.transliteration: dyutānáṃ vo átithiṃ svàrṇaram  agníṃ hótāram mánuṣaḥ svadhvarám  vípraṃ ná dyukṣávacasaṃ suvr̥ktíbhir  havyavā́ham aratíṃ devám r̥ñjase

translation.text: Him, your refulgent guest, Agni who comes from heaven, the Herald of mankind, well-skilled in sacred rites, Who, like a holy singer, utters heavenly words, oblation-bearer, envoy, God, I seek with hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पा॒व॒कया॒ यश्चि॒तय॑न्त्या कृ॒पा क्षाम॑न्रुरु॒च उ॒षसो॒ न भा॒नुना॑ तूर्व॒न्न याम॒न्नेत॑शस्य॒ नू रण॒ आ यो घृ॒णे न त॑तृषा॒णो अ॒जरः॑
verses.transliteration: pāvakáyā yáś citáyantyā kr̥pā́  kṣā́man rurucá uṣáso ná bhānúnā  tū́rvan ná yā́mann étaśasya nū́ ráṇe-  ā́ yó ghr̥ṇé ná tatr̥ṣāṇó ajáraḥ

translation.text: Who with his purifying, eye-attracting form hath shone upon the earth as with the light of Dawn; Who speeding on, as in the fight of Etaia, cometh, untouched by age, as one athirst in heat.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निम॑ग्निं वः स॒मिधा॑ दुवस्यत प्रि॒यम्प्रि॑यं वो॒ अति॑थिं गृणी॒षणि॑ उप॑ वो गी॒र्भिर॒मृतं॑ विवासत दे॒वो दे॒वेषु॒ वन॑ते॒ हि वार्यं॑ दे॒वो दे॒वेषु॒ वन॑ते॒ हि नो॒ दुवः॑
verses.transliteration: agním-agniṃ vaḥ samídhā duvasyata  priyám-priyaṃ vo átithiṃ gr̥ṇīṣáṇi  úpa vo gīrbhír amŕ̥taṃ vivāsata  devó devéṣu vánate hí vā́ryaṃ  devó devéṣu vánate hí no dúvaḥ

translation.text: Worship ye Agni, Agni, with your log of wood; praise your beloved, your beloved guest with songs. Invite ye the Immortal hither with your hymns. A God among the Gods, he loveth what is choice, loveth our service, God mid Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समि॑द्धम॒ग्निं स॒मिधा॑ गि॒रा गृ॑णे॒ शुचिं॑ पाव॒कं पु॒रो अ॑ध्व॒रे ध्रु॒वम् विप्रं॒ होता॑रं पुरु॒वार॑म॒द्रुहं॑ क॒विं सु॒म्नैरी॑महे जा॒तवे॑दसम्
verses.transliteration: sámiddham agníṃ samídhā girā́ gr̥ṇe  śúcim pāvakám puró adhvaré dhruvám  vípraṃ hótāram puruvā́ram adrúhaṃ  kavíṃ sumnaír īmahe jātávedasam

translation.text: Agni inflamed with fuel in my song I sing, pure, Cleanser, steadlast, set in tront at sacrifice. Wise Jâtavedas we implore with prayers for bliss the Priest, the holy Singer, bounteous, void of guile.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां दू॒तम॑ग्ने अ॒मृतं॑ यु॒गेयु॑गे हव्य॒वाहं॑ दधिरे पा॒युमीड्य॑म् दे॒वास॑श्च॒ मर्ता॑सश्च॒ जागृ॑विं वि॒भुं वि॒श्पतिं॒ नम॑सा॒ नि षे॑दिरे
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ dūtám agne amŕ̥taṃ yugé-yuge  havyavā́haṃ dadhire pāyúm ī́ḍyam  devā́saś ca mártāsaś ca jā́gr̥viṃ  vibhúṃ viśpátiṃ námasā ní ṣedire

translation.text: Men, Agni, in each age have made thee, Deathiess One, their envoy, offering-bearer, guard adorable. With reverence Gods and mortals have established thee, the ever-watchful, omnipresent Household Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒भूष॑न्नग्न उ॒भयाँ॒ अनु॑ व्र॒ता दू॒तो दे॒वानां॒ रज॑सी॒ समी॑यसे यत्ते॑ धी॒तिं सु॑म॒तिमा॑वृणी॒महेऽध॑ स्मा नस्त्रि॒वरू॑थः शि॒वो भ॑व
verses.transliteration: vibhū́ṣann agna ubháyām̐ ánu vratā́  dūtó devā́nāṃ rájasī sám īyase  yát te dhītíṃ sumatím āvr̥ṇīmáhe-  -ádha smā nas trivárūthaḥ śivó bhava

translation.text: Thou, Agni, ordering the works and ways of both, as envoy of the Gods traversest both the worlds. When we lay claim to thy regard and gracious fare, be thou to us a thriceprotecting friendly guard.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं सु॒प्रती॑कं सु॒दृशं॒ स्वञ्च॒मवि॑द्वांसो वि॒दुष्ट॑रं सपेम स य॑क्ष॒द्विश्वा॑ व॒युना॑नि वि॒द्वान्प्र ह॒व्यम॒ग्निर॒मृते॑षु वोचत्
verses.transliteration: táṃ suprátīkaṃ sudŕ̥śaṃ sváñcam  ávidvāṃso vidúṣṭaraṃ sapema  sá yakṣad víśvā vayúnāni vidvā́n  prá havyám agnír amŕ̥teṣu vocat

translation.text: Him fair of face, rapid, and fair to look on, him very wise may we who know not follow. Let him who knows all rules invite for worship, Agru announce our offering to the Immortals.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑ग्ने पास्यु॒त तं पि॑पर्षि॒ यस्त॒ आन॑ट् क॒वये॑ शूर धी॒तिम् य॒ज्ञस्य॑ वा॒ निशि॑तिं॒ वोदि॑तिं वा॒ तमित्पृ॑णक्षि॒ शव॑सो॒त रा॒या
verses.transliteration: tám agne pāsy utá tám piparṣi  yás ta ā́naṭ kaváye śūra dhītím  yajñásya vā níśitiṃ vóditiṃ vā  tám ít pr̥ṇakṣi śávasotá rāyā́

translation.text: Him, Agni, thou deliverest and savest who brings him prayer to thee the Wise, O Hero, The end of sacrifice or its inception; yea, thou endowest him with power and riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने वनुष्य॒तो नि पा॑हि॒ त्वमु॑ नः सहसावन्नव॒द्यात् सं त्वा॑ ध्वस्म॒न्वद॒भ्ये॑तु॒ पाथः॒ सं र॒यिः स्पृ॑ह॒याय्यः॑ सह॒स्री
verses.transliteration: tvám agne vanuṣyató ní pāhi  tvám u naḥ sahasāvann avadyā́t  sáṃ tvā dhvasmanvád abhy ètu pā́thaḥ  sáṃ rayí spr̥hayā́yyaḥ sahasrī́

translation.text: Guard us from him who would assail us, Agni; preserve us, O thou Victor, from dishonour. Here let the place of darkening come upon thee: may wealth be ours, desirable in thousands.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्होता॑ गृ॒हप॑तिः॒ स राजा॒ विश्वा॑ वेद॒ जनि॑मा जा॒तवे॑दाः दे॒वाना॑मु॒त यो मर्त्या॑नां॒ यजि॑ष्ठः॒ स प्र य॑जतामृ॒तावा॑
verses.transliteration: agnír hótā gr̥hápatiḥ sá rā́jā  víśvā veda jánimā jātávedāḥ  devā́nām utá yó mártyānāṃ  yájiṣṭhaḥ sá prá yajatām r̥tā́vā

translation.text: Agni, the Priest, is King, Lord of the homestead, he, Jatayedas, knows all generations. Most skilful worshipper mid Gods and mortals, may he begin the sacrifice, the Holy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ यद॒द्य वि॒शो अ॑ध्वरस्य होतः॒ पाव॑कशोचे॒ वेष्ट्वं हि यज्वा॑ ऋ॒ता य॑जासि महि॒ना वि यद्भूर्ह॒व्या व॑ह यविष्ठ॒ या ते॑ अ॒द्य
verses.transliteration: ágne yád adyá viśó adhvarasya hotaḥ  pā́vakaśoce véṣ ṭváṃ hí yájvā  r̥tā́ yajāsi mahinā́ ví yád bhū́r  havyā́ vaha yaviṣṭha yā́ te adyá

translation.text: Whate'er to-day thou, bright-flamed Priest, enjoyest from the man's rite-for thou art sacrificer Worship, for duly dost thou spread in greatness: bear off thine ofrerings of to-day, Most Youthful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्रयां॑सि॒ सुधि॑तानि॒ हि ख्यो नि त्वा॑ दधीत॒ रोद॑सी॒ यज॑ध्यै अवा॑ नो मघव॒न्वाज॑साता॒वग्ने॒ विश्वा॑नि दुरि॒ता त॑रेम॒ ता त॑रेम॒ तवाव॑सा तरेम
verses.transliteration: abhí práyāṃsi súdhitāni hí khyó  ní tvā dadhīta ródasī yájadhyai  ávā no maghavan vā́jasātāv  ágne víśvāni duritā́ tarema  tā́ tarema távā́vasā tarema

translation.text: Look thou upon the viands duly laid for thee. Fain would he set thee here to worship Heaven and,Earth. Help us, O liberal Agni, in the strife for spoil, so that we may o'ercome all things that trouble us, o'ercome, o'ercome them with thy help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ विश्वे॑भिः स्वनीक दे॒वैरूर्णा॑वन्तं प्रथ॒मः सी॑द॒ योनि॑म् कु॒ला॒यिनं॑ घृ॒तव॑न्तं सवि॒त्रे य॒ज्ञं न॑य॒ यज॑मानाय सा॒धु
verses.transliteration: ágne víśvebhiḥ svanīka devaír  ū́rṇāvantam prathamáḥ sīda yónim  kulāyínaṃ ghr̥távantaṃ savitré  yajñáṃ naya yájamānāya sādhú

translation.text: Together with all Gods, O fair-faced Agni, be seated first upon the woollined altar, Nest-like, bedewed with oil. Bear this our worship to Savitar who sacrifices rightly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ममु॒ त्यम॑थर्व॒वद॒ग्निं म॑न्थन्ति वे॒धसः॑ यम॑ङ्कू॒यन्त॒मान॑य॒न्नमू॑रं श्या॒व्या॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: imám u tyám atharvavád  agním manthanti vedhásaḥ  yám aṅkūyántam ā́nayann  ámūraṃ śyāvyā̀bhyaḥ

translation.text: Here the arranging priests, as did Atharvan, rub this Agni forth, Whom, not bewildered, as he moved in winding ways, they brought from gloom.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जनि॑ष्वा दे॒ववी॑तये स॒र्वता॑ता स्व॒स्तये॑ आ दे॒वान्व॑क्ष्य॒मृताँ॑ ऋता॒वृधो॑ य॒ज्ञं दे॒वेषु॑ पिस्पृशः
verses.transliteration: jániṣvā devávītaye  sarvátātā svastáye  ā́ devā́n vakṣy amŕ̥tām̐ r̥tāvŕ̥dho  yajñáṃ devéṣu pispr̥śaḥ

translation.text: For the Gods' banquet be thou born, for full perfection and for weal. Bring the Immortal Gods who strengthen holy Law: so let our sacrifice reach the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यमु॑ त्वा गृहपते जनाना॒मग्ने॒ अक॑र्म स॒मिधा॑ बृ॒हन्त॑म् अ॒स्थू॒रि नो॒ गार्ह॑पत्यानि सन्तु ति॒ग्मेन॑ न॒स्तेज॑सा॒ सं शि॑शाधि
verses.transliteration: vayám u tvā gr̥hapate janānām  ágne ákarma samídhā br̥hántam  asthūrí no gā́rhapatyāni santu  tigména nas téjasā sáṃ śiśādhi

translation.text: O Agni, Lord and Master of men's homesteads, with kindled fuel we have made thee mighty. Let not our household gear be found defective. Sharpen us with thy penetrating splendour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने य॒ज्ञानां॒ होता॒ विश्वे॑षां हि॒तः दे॒वेभि॒र्मानु॑षे॒ जने॑
verses.transliteration: tvám agne yajñā́nāṃ  hótā víśveṣāṃ hitáḥ  devébhir mā́nuṣe jáne

translation.text: PRIEST of all sacrifices hast thou been appointed by the Gods, Agni, amid the race of man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ म॒न्द्राभि॑रध्व॒रे जि॒ह्वाभि॑र्यजा म॒हः आ दे॒वान्व॑क्षि॒ यक्षि॑ च
verses.transliteration: sá no mandrā́bhir adhvaré  jihvā́bhir yajā maháḥ  ā́ devā́n vakṣi yákṣi ca

translation.text: So with thy joyous tongues for us sacrifice nobly in this rite. Bring thou the Gods and worship them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वेत्था॒ हि वे॑धो॒ अध्व॑नः प॒थश्च॑ दे॒वाञ्ज॑सा अग्ने॑ य॒ज्ञेषु॑ सुक्रतो
verses.transliteration: vétthā hí vedho ádhvanaḥ  patháś ca devā́ñjasā  ágne yajñéṣu sukrato

translation.text: For well, O God, Disposer, thou knowest, straight on, the paths and ways, Agni, most wise in sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामी॑ळे॒ अध॑ द्वि॒ता भ॑र॒तो वा॒जिभिः॑ शु॒नम् ई॒जे य॒ज्ञेषु॑ य॒ज्ञिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m īḷe ádha dvitā́  bharató vājíbhiḥ śunám  ījé yajñéṣu yajñíyam

translation.text: Thee, too, hath Bharata of old, with mighty men, implored for bliss. And worshipped thee the worshipful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमि॒मा वार्या॑ पु॒रु दिवो॑दासाय सुन्व॒ते भ॒रद्वा॑जाय दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: tvám imā́ vā́ryā purú  dívodāsāya sunvaté  bharádvājāya dāśúṣe

translation.text: Thou givest these abundant boons to Divodâsa pouring forth, To Bharadvâja offering gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं दू॒तो अम॑र्त्य॒ आ व॑हा॒ दैव्यं॒ जन॑म् शृ॒ण्वन्विप्र॑स्य सुष्टु॒तिम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ dūtó ámartyaḥ-  ā́ vahā daívyaṃ jánam  śr̥ṇván víprasya suṣṭutím

translation.text: Do thou, Immortal Messenger, bring hither the Celestial Folk; Hearing the singer's eulogy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने स्वा॒ध्यो॒३॒॑ मर्ता॑सो दे॒ववी॑तये य॒ज्ञेषु॑ दे॒वमी॑ळते
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne svādhyò  mártāso devávītaye  yajñéṣu devám īḷate

translation.text: Mortals with pious thought implore thee, Agni, God, at holy rites, To come unto the feast of Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ प्र य॑क्षि सं॒दृश॑मु॒त क्रतुं॑ सु॒दान॑वः विश्वे॑ जुषन्त का॒मिनः॑
verses.transliteration: táva prá yakṣi saṃdŕ̥śam  utá krátuṃ sudā́navaḥ  víśve juṣanta kāmínaḥ

translation.text: I glorify thine aspect and the might of thee the Bountilul. All those who love shall joy in thee,

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं होता॒ मनु॑र्हितो॒ वह्नि॑रा॒सा वि॒दुष्ट॑रः अग्ने॒ यक्षि॑ दि॒वो विशः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hótā mánurhitaḥ-  váhnir āsā́ vidúṣṭaraḥ  ágne yákṣi divó víśaḥ

translation.text: Invoker placed by Manus, thou, Agni, art near, the wisest Priest: Pay worship to the Tribes of Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्न॒ आ या॑हि वी॒तये॑ गृणा॒नो ह॒व्यदा॑तये नि होता॑ सत्सि ब॒र्हिषि॑
verses.transliteration: ágna ā́ yāhi vītáye  gr̥ṇānó havyádātaye  ní hótā satsi barhíṣi

translation.text: Come, Agni, lauded, to the feast; come to the offering of the gifts. As Priest be seated on the grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ स॒मिद्भि॑रङ्गिरो घृ॒तेन॑ वर्धयामसि बृ॒हच्छो॑चा यविष्ठ्य
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā samídbhir aṅgiro  ghr̥téna vardhayāmasi  br̥hác chocā yaviṣṭhya

translation.text: So, Angiras, we make thee strong with fuel and with holy oil. Blaze high, thou youngest of the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ पृ॒थु श्र॒वाय्य॒मच्छा॑ देव विवाससि बृ॒हद॑ग्ने सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pr̥thú śravā́yyam  áchā deva vivāsasi  br̥hád agne suvī́ryam

translation.text: For us thou winnest, Agni, God, heroic strength exceeding great, Far-spreading and of high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ पुष्क॑रा॒दध्यथ॑र्वा॒ निर॑मन्थत मू॒र्ध्नो विश्व॑स्य वा॒घतः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne púṣkarād ádhi-  átharvā nír amanthata  mūrdhnó víśvasya vāghátaḥ

translation.text: Agni, Atharvan brought thee forth, by rubbing, from the lotus-flower, The head of Viṣva, of the Priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ त्वा द॒ध्यङ्ङृषिः॑ पु॒त्र ई॑धे॒ अथ॑र्वणः वृ॒त्र॒हणं॑ पुरंद॒रम्
verses.transliteration: tám u tvā dadhyáṅṅ ŕ̥ṣiḥ  putrá īdhe átharvaṇaḥ  vr̥traháṇam puraṃdarám

translation.text: Thee. Vr̥itra's slayer, breaker down of castles, hath Atharvan's son, Dadhyac the R̥ishi, lighted up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ त्वा पा॒थ्यो वृषा॒ समी॑धे दस्यु॒हन्त॑मम् ध॒नं॒ज॒यं रणे॑रणे
verses.transliteration: tám u tvā pāthyó vŕ̥ṣā  sám īdhe dasyuhántamam  dhanaṃjayáṃ ráṇe-raṇe

translation.text: The hero Pâthya kindled thee the Dasyus'. most destructive foe, Winner of spoil in every fight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एह्यू॒ षु ब्रवा॑णि॒ तेऽग्न॑ इ॒त्थेत॑रा॒ गिरः॑ ए॒भिर्व॑र्धास॒ इन्दु॑भिः
verses.transliteration: éhy ū ṣú brávāṇi te-  -ágna itthétarā gíraḥ  ebhír vardhāsa índubhiḥ

translation.text: Come, here, O Agni, will I sing verily other songs to thee, And with these drops shalt thou grow strong.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्र॒ क्व॑ च ते॒ मनो॒ दक्षं॑ दधस॒ उत्त॑रम् तत्रा॒ सदः॑ कृणवसे
verses.transliteration: yátra kvà ca te máno  dákṣaṃ dadhasa úttaram  tátrā sádaḥ kr̥ṇavase

translation.text: Where'er thy mind applies itself, vigour preeminent bast thou: There wilt thou gain a dwelling-place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि ते॑ पू॒र्तम॑क्षि॒पद्भुव॑न्नेमानां वसो अथा॒ दुवो॑ वनवसे
verses.transliteration: nahí te pūrtám akṣipád  bhúvan nemānāṃ vaso  áthā dúvo vanavase

translation.text: Not for a moment only lasts thy bounty, good to many a one! Our service therefore shalt thou gain.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आग्निर॑गामि॒ भार॑तो वृत्र॒हा पु॑रु॒चेत॑नः दिवो॑दासस्य॒ सत्प॑तिः
verses.transliteration: ā́gnír agāmi bhā́rato  vr̥trahā́ purucétanaḥ  dívodāsasya sátpatiḥ

translation.text: Agni, the Bharata, hath been sought, the Vr̥itra-slayer, marked of all, Yea, Divodâsa's Hero Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि विश्वाति॒ पार्थि॑वा र॒यिं दाश॑न्महित्व॒ना व॒न्वन्नवा॑तो॒ अस्तृ॑तः
verses.transliteration: sá hí víśvā́ti pā́rthivā  rayíṃ dā́śan mahitvanā́  vanvánn ávāto ástr̥taḥ

translation.text: For he gave riches that surpass in greatness all the things of earth, Fighting untroubled, unsubdued.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प्र॑त्न॒वन्नवी॑य॒साग्ने॑ द्यु॒म्नेन॑ सं॒यता॑ बृ॒हत्त॑तन्थ भा॒नुना॑
verses.transliteration: sá pratnaván návīyasā-  -ágne dyumnéna saṃyátā  br̥hát tatantha bhānúnā

translation.text: Thou, Agni, as in days of old, with recent glory, gathered light, Hast overspread the lofty heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वः॑ सखायो अ॒ग्नये॒ स्तोमं॑ य॒ज्ञं च॑ धृष्णु॒या अर्च॒ गाय॑ च वे॒धसे॑
verses.transliteration: prá vaḥ sakhāyo agnáye  stómaṃ yajñáṃ ca dhr̥ṣṇuyā́  árca gā́ya ca vedháse

translation.text: Bring to your Agni, O my friends, boldly your laud and sacrifice: Give the Disposer praise and song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि यो मानु॑षा यु॒गा सीद॒द्धोता॑ क॒विक्र॑तुः दू॒तश्च॑ हव्य॒वाह॑नः
verses.transliteration: sá hí yó mā́nuṣā yugā́  sī́dad dhótā kavíkratuḥ  dūtáś ca havyavā́hanaḥ

translation.text: For as sagacious Herald he hath sat through every age of man, Oblation-bearing messenger.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता राजा॑ना॒ शुचि॑व्रतादि॒त्यान्मारु॑तं ग॒णम् वसो॒ यक्षी॒ह रोद॑सी
verses.transliteration: tā́ rā́jānā śúcivratā-  ādityā́n mā́rutaṃ gaṇám  váso yákṣīhá ródasī

translation.text: Bring those Two Kings whose ways are pure, Âdityas, and the Marut host, Excellent God! and Heaven and Earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वस्वी॑ ते अग्ने॒ संदृ॑ष्टिरिषय॒ते मर्त्या॑य ऊर्जो॑ नपाद॒मृत॑स्य
verses.transliteration: vásvī te agne sáṃdr̥ṣṭir  iṣayaté mártyāya  ū́rjo napād amŕ̥tasya

translation.text: For strong and active mortal man, excellent, Agni, is the look Of thee Immortal, Son of Strength

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रत्वा॒ दा अ॑स्तु॒ श्रेष्ठो॒ऽद्य त्वा॑ व॒न्वन्त्सु॒रेक्णाः॑ मर्त॑ आनाश सुवृ॒क्तिम्
verses.transliteration: krátvā dā́ astu śréṣṭho  -adyá tvā vanván surékṇāḥ  márta ānāśa suvr̥ktím

translation.text: Rich through his wisdom, noblest be the giver serving thee to-day: The man hath brought his hymn of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते ते॑ अग्ने॒ त्वोता॑ इ॒षय॑न्तो॒ विश्व॒मायुः॑ तर॑न्तो अ॒र्यो अरा॑तीर्व॒न्वन्तो॑ अ॒र्यो अरा॑तीः
verses.transliteration: té te agne tvótāḥ-  iṣáyanto víśvam ā́yuḥ  táranto aryó árātīr  vanvánto aryó árātīḥ

translation.text: These, Agni, these are helped by thee, who strong and active all their lives, O'ercome the malice of the foe, fight down the malice ofthe foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निस्ति॒ग्मेन॑ शो॒चिषा॒ यास॒द्विश्वं॒ न्य१॒॑त्रिण॑म् अ॒ग्निर्नो॑ वनते र॒यिम्
verses.transliteration: agnís tigména śocíṣā  yā́sad víśvaṃ ny àtríṇam  agnír no vanate rayím

translation.text: May Agni with his pointed blaze cast down each fierce devouring fiend May Agni win us wealth by war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒वीरं॑ र॒यिमा भ॑र॒ जात॑वेदो॒ विच॑र्षणे ज॒हि रक्षां॑सि सुक्रतो
verses.transliteration: suvī́raṃ rayím ā́ bhara  jā́tavedo vícarṣaṇe  jahí rákṣāṃsi sukrato

translation.text: O active Jâtavedas, bring riches with store of hero sons: Slay thou the demons, O Most Wise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नः॑ पा॒ह्यंह॑सो॒ जात॑वेदो अघाय॒तः रक्षा॑ णो ब्रह्मणस्कवे
verses.transliteration: tváṃ naḥ pāhy áṃhaso  jā́tavedo aghāyatáḥ  rákṣā ṇo brahmaṇas kave

translation.text: Keep us, O Jâtavedas, from the troubling of the man of sin: Guard us thou Sage who knowest prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नो॑ अग्ने दु॒रेव॒ आ मर्तो॑ व॒धाय॒ दाश॑ति तस्मा॑न्नः पा॒ह्यंह॑सः
verses.transliteration: yó no agne duréva~ā́  márto vadhā́ya dā́śati  tásmān naḥ pāhy áṃhasaḥ

translation.text: Whatever sinner, Agni, brings oblations to procure our death, Save us from woe that he would work.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं तं दे॑व जि॒ह्वया॒ परि॑ बाधस्व दु॒ष्कृत॑म् मर्तो॒ यो नो॒ जिघां॑सति
verses.transliteration: tváṃ táṃ deva jihváyā  pári bādhasva duṣkŕ̥tam  márto yó no jíghāṃsati

translation.text: Drive from us with thy tongue, O God, the man who doeth evil deeds, The mortal who would strike us dead.

verses.sanskrit_deva: भ॒रद्वा॑जाय स॒प्रथः॒ शर्म॑ यच्छ सहन्त्य अग्ने॒ वरे॑ण्यं॒ वसु॑
verses.transliteration: bharádvājāya sapráthaḥ  śárma yacha sahantya  ágne váreṇyaṃ vásu

translation.text: Give shelter reaching far and wide to Bharadvâja, conquering Lord! Agni, send wealth most excellent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्वृ॒त्राणि॑ जङ्घनद्द्रविण॒स्युर्वि॑प॒न्यया॑ समि॑द्धः शु॒क्र आहु॑तः
verses.transliteration: agnír vr̥trā́ṇi jaṅghanad  draviṇasyúr vipanyáyā  sámiddhaḥ śukrá ā́hutaḥ

translation.text: May Agni slay the Vr̥itras,– fain for riches, through the lord of song, Served with oblation, kindled, bright.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गर्भे॑ मा॒तुः पि॒तुष्पि॒ता वि॑दिद्युता॒नो अ॒क्षरे॑ सीद॑न्नृ॒तस्य॒ योनि॒मा
verses.transliteration: gárbhe mātúḥ pitúṣ pitā́  vididyutānó akṣáre  sī́dann r̥tásya yónim ā́

translation.text: His Father's Father, shining in his Mother's everlasting side, Set on the seat of holy Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब्रह्म॑ प्र॒जाव॒दा भ॑र॒ जात॑वेदो॒ विच॑र्षणे अग्ने॒ यद्दी॒दय॑द्दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: bráhma prajā́vad ā́ bhara  jā́tavedo vícarṣaṇe  ágne yád dīdáyad diví

translation.text: O active Jâtavedas, bring devotion that wins progeny, Agni, that it may shine to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ त्वा र॒ण्वसं॑दृशं॒ प्रय॑स्वन्तः सहस्कृत अग्ने॑ ससृ॒ज्महे॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: úpa tvā raṇvásaṃdr̥śam  práyasvantaḥ sahaskr̥ta  ágne sasr̥jmáhe gíraḥ

translation.text: O Child of Strength, to thee whose look is lovely we with dainty food, O Agni, have poured forth our songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ च्छा॒यामि॑व॒ घृणे॒रग॑न्म॒ शर्म॑ ते व॒यम् अग्ने॒ हिर॑ण्यसंदृशः
verses.transliteration: úpa chāyā́m iva ghŕ̥ṇer  áganma śárma te vayám  ágne híraṇyasaṃdr̥śaḥ

translation.text: To thee for shelter are we come, as to the shade from fervent heat Agni, who glitterest like gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒ग्र इ॑व शर्य॒हा ति॒ग्मशृ॑ङ्गो॒ न वंस॑गः अग्ने॒ पुरो॑ रु॒रोजि॑थ
verses.transliteration: yá ugrá iva śaryahā́  tigmáśr̥ṅgo ná váṃsagaḥ  ágne púro rurójitha

translation.text: Mighty as one who slays with shafts, or like a bull with sharpened horn, Agni, thou breakest down the forts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यं हस्ते॒ न खा॒दिनं॒ शिशुं॑ जा॒तं न बिभ्र॑ति वि॒शाम॒ग्निं स्व॑ध्व॒रम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ yáṃ háste ná khādínaṃ  śíśuṃ jātáṃ ná bíbhrati  viśā́m agníṃ svadhvarám

translation.text: Whom, like an infant newly born, devourer, in their arms they bear, Men's Agni, skilled in holy rites.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र दे॒वं दे॒ववी॑तये॒ भर॑ता वसु॒वित्त॑मम् आ स्वे योनौ॒ नि षी॑दतु
verses.transliteration: prá deváṃ devávītaye  bháratā vasuvíttamam  ā́ své yónau ní ṣīdatu

translation.text: Bear to the banquet of the Gods the God best finder-out of wealth, Let him he seated in his place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ जा॒तं जा॒तवे॑दसि प्रि॒यं शि॑शी॒ताति॑थिम् स्यो॒न आ गृ॒हप॑तिम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ jātáṃ jātávedasi  priyáṃ śiśītā́tithim  syoná ā́ gr̥hápatim

translation.text: In Jâtavedas kindle ye the dear guest who hath now appeared In a soft place, the homestead's Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ यु॒क्ष्वा हि ये तवाश्वा॑सो देव सा॒धवः॑ अरं॒ वह॑न्ति म॒न्यवे॑
verses.transliteration: ágne yukṣvā́ hí yé táva-  -áśvāso deva sādhávaḥ  áraṃ váhanti manyáve

translation.text: Harness, O Agni, O thou God, thy steeds which are most excellent: They bear thee as thy spirit wills.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अच्छा॑ नो या॒ह्या व॑हा॒भि प्रयां॑सि वी॒तये॑ आ दे॒वान्त्सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: áchā no yāhy ā́ vaha-  -abhí práyāṃsi vītáye  ā́ devā́n sómapītaye

translation.text: Come hither, bring the Gods to us to taste the sacrificial feast, To drink the draught of Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उद॑ग्ने भारत द्यु॒मदज॑स्रेण॒ दवि॑द्युतत् शोचा॒ वि भा॑ह्यजर
verses.transliteration: úd agne bhārata dyumád  ájasreṇa dávidyutat  śócā ví bhāhy ajara

translation.text: O Agni of the Bharatas, blaze high with everlasting might, Shine forth and gleam, Eternal One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वी॒ती यो दे॒वं मर्तो॑ दुव॒स्येद॒ग्निमी॑ळीताध्व॒रे ह॒विष्मा॑न् होता॑रं सत्य॒यजं॒ रोद॑स्योरुत्ता॒नह॑स्तो॒ नम॒सा वि॑वासेत्
verses.transliteration: vītī́ yó devám márto duvasyéd  agním īḷītādhvaré havíṣmān  hótāraṃ satyayájaṃ ródasyoḥ  uttānáhasto námasā́ vivāset

translation.text: The mortal man who serves the God with banquet, and, bringing gifts at sacrifice, lauds Agni, May well attract, with prayer and hands uplifted, the Priest of Heaven and Earth, true Sacrificer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ अग्न ऋ॒चा ह॒विर्हृ॒दा त॒ष्टं भ॑रामसि ते ते॑ भवन्तू॒क्षण॑ ऋष॒भासो॑ व॒शा उ॒त
verses.transliteration: ā́ te agna r̥cā́ havíḥ  hr̥dā́ taṣṭám bharāmasi  té te bhavantūkṣáṇaḥ-  r̥ṣabhā́so vaśā́ utá

translation.text: Agni, we bring thee, with our hymn, oblation fashioned in the heart. Let these be oxen unto thee, let these be bulls and kine to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं दे॒वासो॑ अग्रि॒यमि॒न्धते॑ वृत्र॒हन्त॑मम् येना॒ वसू॒न्याभृ॑ता तृ॒ळ्हा रक्षां॑सि वा॒जिना॑
verses.transliteration: agníṃ devā́so agriyám  indháte vr̥trahántamam  yénā vásūny ā́bhr̥tā  tr̥ḷhā́ rákṣāṃsi vājínā

translation.text: The Gods enkindle Agni, best slayer of Vr̥itra, first in rank, The Mighty, One who brings us wealth and crushes down the Raksasas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिबा॒ सोम॑म॒भि यमु॑ग्र॒ तर्द॑ ऊ॒र्वं गव्यं॒ महि॑ गृणा॒न इ॑न्द्र वि यो धृ॑ष्णो॒ वधि॑षो वज्रहस्त॒ विश्वा॑ वृ॒त्रम॑मि॒त्रिया॒ शवो॑भिः
verses.transliteration: píbā sómam abhí yám ugra tárdaḥ-  ūrváṃ gávyam máhi gr̥ṇāná indra  ví yó dhr̥ṣṇo vádhiṣo vajrahasta  víśvā vr̥trám amitríyā śávobhiḥ

translation.text: DRINK Soma, Mighty One, for which, when lauded, thou breakest through the cattle-stall, O Indra; Thou who, O Bold One, armed with thunder smotest Vr̥itra with might, and every hostile being.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स ईं॑ पाहि॒ य ऋ॑जी॒षी तरु॑त्रो॒ यः शिप्र॑वान्वृष॒भो यो म॑ती॒नाम् यो गो॑त्र॒भिद्व॑ज्र॒भृद्यो ह॑रि॒ष्ठाः स इ॑न्द्र चि॒त्राँ अ॒भि तृ॑न्धि॒ वाजा॑न्
verses.transliteration: sá īm pāhi yá r̥jīṣī́ tárutro  yáḥ śípravān vr̥ṣabhó yó matīnā́m  yó gotrabhíd vajrabhŕ̥d yó hariṣṭhā́ḥ  sá indra citrā́m̐ abhí tr̥ndhi vā́jān

translation.text: Drink it thou God who art impetuous victor, Lord of our hymns, with beauteousjaws, the Hero, Render of kine-stalls, car-borne, thunder-wielding, so pierce thy way to wondrous strength, O Indra.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा पा॑हि प्र॒त्नथा॒ मन्द॑तु त्वा श्रु॒धि ब्रह्म॑ वावृ॒धस्वो॒त गी॒र्भिः आ॒विः सूर्यं॑ कृणु॒हि पी॑पि॒हीषो॑ ज॒हि शत्रूँ॑र॒भि गा इ॑न्द्र तृन्धि
verses.transliteration: evā́ pāhi pratnáthā mándatu tvā  śrudhí bráhma vāvr̥dhásvotá gīrbhíḥ  āvíḥ sū́ryaṃ kr̥ṇuhí pīpihī́ṣo  jahí śátrūm̐r abhí gā́ indra tr̥ndhi

translation.text: Drink as of old, and let the draught delight thee. hear thou our prayer and let our songs exalt thee. Make the Sun visible, make food abundant, slaughter the foes, pierce through and free the cattle.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते त्वा॒ मदा॑ बृ॒हदि॑न्द्र स्वधाव इ॒मे पी॒ता उ॑क्षयन्त द्यु॒मन्त॑म् म॒हामनू॑नं त॒वसं॒ विभू॑तिं मत्स॒रासो॑ जर्हृषन्त प्र॒साह॑म्
verses.transliteration: té tvā mádā br̥hád indra svadhāvaḥ-  imé pītā́ ukṣayanta dyumántam  mahā́m ánūnaṃ tavásaṃ víbhūtim  matsarā́so jarhr̥ṣanta prasā́ham

translation.text: These gladdening drops, O Indra, Self-sustainer, quaffed shall augment thee in thy mighty splendour. Yea, let the cheering drops delight thee greatly, great, perfect, strong, powerful, all-subduing.

verses.sanskrit_deva: येभिः॒ सूर्य॑मु॒षसं॑ मन्दसा॒नोऽवा॑स॒योऽप॑ दृ॒ळ्हानि॒ दर्द्र॑त् म॒हामद्रिं॒ परि॒ गा इ॑न्द्र॒ सन्तं॑ नु॒त्था अच्यु॑तं॒ सद॑स॒स्परि॒ स्वात्
verses.transliteration: yébhiḥ sū́ryam uṣásam mandasānó  -ávāsayó 'pa dr̥ḷhā́ni dárdrat  mahā́m ádrim pári gā́ indra sántaṃ  nutthā́ ácyutaṃ sádasas pári svā́t

translation.text: Gladdened whereby, bursting the firm enclosures, thou gavest splendour to the Sun and Morning. The mighty rock that compassed in the cattle, ne'er moved, thou shookest from its seat, O Indra.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ क्रत्वा॒ तव॒ तद्दं॒सना॑भिरा॒मासु॑ प॒क्वं शच्या॒ नि दी॑धः और्णो॒र्दुर॑ उ॒स्रिया॑भ्यो॒ वि दृ॒ळ्होदू॒र्वाद्गा अ॑सृजो॒ अङ्गि॑रस्वान्
verses.transliteration: táva krátvā táva tád daṃsánābhir  āmā́su pakváṃ śácyā ní dīdhaḥ  aúrṇor dúra usríyābhyo ví dr̥ḷhā́-  -úd ūrvā́d gā́ asr̥jo áṅgirasvān

translation.text: Thou with thy wisdom, power, and works of wonder, hast stored the ripe milk in the raw cows' udders Unbarred the firm doors for the kine of Morning, and, with the Angirases, set free the cattle.
